<script>
				$script('/includes/javascript/magnificPopup/jquery.magnific-popup.min.js', function(){ $script('/includes/javascript/ASPModal.old.js'); });

				jQuery(document).ready(function(){

					jQuery(document).on('click','.js-share-button',showShareDialog);

					function showShareDialog(e)
					{
						e.preventDefault();

						var Site = jQuery(this).attr('data-site');

						if (jQuery(this).attr('data-slug') != '') {
							var PageUrl = jQuery(this).attr('data-slug');
						} else {
							var PageUrl = location.href;
						}

						var contentId = '';
						if (jQuery(this).attr('data-contentId') != '') {
							var contentId = jQuery(this).attr('data-contentId');
						}

						jQuery.get
							( '__share/buttons/getShareUrl'
							, { Site:Site , PageUrl:PageUrl , PageTitle:document.title, contentId:contentId }
							, redirectToShare
							);

						
							//var _paq = _paq || [];
							//piwik - track share event, and set value for dimension6 in action scope
							_paq.push(['trackEvent','General','Share',Site,null,{dimension6:PageUrl}]);
						
					}

					function redirectToShare(data)
					{
						//open email share in modal
						if(data.ShareTo.indexOf('__share/email') == 0)
							openRemoteModal(data.ShareTo);
						else{

						var popupBlockerChecker = {
									check: function(popup_window){
											var _scope = this;
											if (popup_window) {
													if(/chrome/.test(navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase())){
															setTimeout(function () {
																	_scope._is_popup_blocked(_scope, popup_window);
															 },200);
													}else{
															popup_window.onload = function () {
																	_scope._is_popup_blocked(_scope, popup_window);
															};
													}
											}else{
													_scope._displayError();
											}
									},
									_is_popup_blocked: function(scope, popup_window){
											if ((popup_window.innerHeight > 0)==false){ scope._displayError(); }
									},
									_displayError: function(){
											alert("Popup Blocker is enabled! Please add this site to your exception list.");
									}
							};

							var popup = window.open(data.ShareTo,'_blank','width=620,height=440');
							popupBlockerChecker.check(popup);
						}
					}

				});

<div class="section__body__article section__body__article--id-2">
<a class="anchor" name="Welcome to Affiliate Summit"></a>
<article class="article article--default">
<div class="article__header">
<h3 class="article__header__title"> <p>Welcome to Affiliate Summit</p> </h3>
</div>
<div class="article__body">
<p>Affiliate Summit is the premier affiliate marketing conference.</p>
<p>Attendees at Affiliate Summit events break out into six main categories: affiliate, affiliate management, advertiser, OPM/agency, solution provider, and network. Affiliates typically account for about a quarter of attendees at Affiliate Summit.</p>
<p> </p>
</div>
</article>
<script>
		$script('/__themes/_base/1-1-0/includes/javascripts/src/modules/pages/anchor.js');
	</script>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section section--one-column section--id-3 section--Grey-BG">
<div class="section__body">
<div class="section__body__article section__body__article--id-1">
<article class="article article--stats">
<div class="article__body">
<ul>
<li><span class="stat-number">4</span><br/> Affiliate Summit takes place in Asia, Europe, The West Coast and The East Coast.</li>
<li> </li>
<li><span class="stat-number">12,000</span><br/> Over 12,000 digital marketers attend Affiliate Summit</li>
<li> </li>
<li><span class="stat-number">1000</span><br/> Over 1,000 Exhibitors.</li>
<li> </li>
<li><span class="stat-number">200</span><br/> Over 200 expert speakers.</li>
</ul>
</div>
</article>

		$script('/__themes/_base/1-1-0/includes/javascripts/src/modules/pages/anchor.js');

<h2 class="section__header__title"> Featured speakers </h2>
</div>
<div class="section__body">
<div class="section__body__article section__body__article--id-1">
<article class="article article--default">
<div class="article__body">
<script type="text/javascript">$script('/__includes/js/librarysearch.js');$script('/includes/javascript/magnificPopup/jquery.magnific-popup.min.js', function(){ $script('/includes/javascript/ASPModal.old.js'); });</script>

<div class="section section--one-column section--id-5 section--Grey-BG-Icon">
<div class="section__header">
<h2 class="section__header__title"> Top News </h2>
</div>
<div class="section__body">
<div class="section__body__article section__body__article--id-1">
<article class="article article--default">
<div class="article__body">
<script type="text/javascript">$script('/__includes/js/librarysearch.js');$script('/includes/javascript/magnificPopup/jquery.magnific-popup.min.js', function(){ $script('/includes/javascript/ASPModal.old.js'); });</script>
<div class="js-librarylistwrapper" data-librarytitle="Blog" data-totalcount="2399">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list m-libraries-blogs-list--carousel js-m-libraries-list-carousel">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__loading">
<div class="p-loader p-loader--overlay js-w-library-loading" searchgroup="E10E68F2-blog">
<span class="p-loader__icon"></span>
<span class="p-loader__text">Loading</span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="bx-wrapper" style="max-width: 770px;"><div class="bx-viewport" style="width: 100%; overflow: hidden; position: relative; height: 655px;"><ul class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items js-library-list js-m-libraries-list-carousel-items" searchgroup="E10E68F2-blog" searchrefresh=".m-libraries-blogs-list__count" style="width: 2615%; position: relative; transition-duration: 0s; transform: translate3d(-693px, 0px, 0px);"><li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-27435 js-library-item bx-clone" data-author="Affiliate Summit" data-content-i-d="27435" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="29-Aug-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;People are giving up Facebook and Instagram because they find themselves spending too much time consuming &amp;lsquo;garbage content&amp;rsquo;. By Jason Hunt&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;What most people do not know is that you have total control over your experience on Facebook. The Facebook algorithm works in such a way that the user experience is predicated on the behaviors you take while sifting through content.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
If you have the tendency to engage on political articles, then you can expect that more of it will populate your news feed. When you like and comment on your friends baby photos, you are continuing to feed the algorithm as a user that enjoys baby photos so you can expect to see similar content from your friends.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
If you&amp;rsquo;re a person that consumes a lot of video content, then you&amp;rsquo;ll be served more videos. If you&amp;rsquo;re a foodie then you&amp;rsquo;re likely being targeted by every restaurant in town, and if you have the tendency to buy products online then voila! More product advertisements will be up in your face.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
My Facebook experience is full of chitter chatter, banter, and knowledge consumption within social media marketing groups, because that is where I&amp;rsquo;m engaged. My experience is enjoyable and has me coming back for more without complaints.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;Here are three easy ways you can control your experience on Facebook:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Engage with the content you want to see. Facebook wants to give you more of what you like so be aware of the behaviours you are taking on the platform and like more of the content you want to see.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Hide the things you don&amp;rsquo;t want to see. On the top right hand side of every post there are three little dots. When you click on those dots you will see an option to &amp;lsquo;Hide this post.&amp;rsquo; You will then be asked the reason on why you want to hide this post and you can choose &amp;lsquo;irrelevant&amp;rsquo;. By selecting this option you are telling Facebook to stop showing you this type of content. Sick of seeing content from Life Coaches trying to change your life then select &amp;lsquo;irrelevant&amp;rsquo; and you&amp;rsquo;ll never see an ad from another Life changing coach again.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
See good content first. You have the ability to turn on notifications for groups that you follow so you can be notified anytime someone posts in a group. Do you have groups that publish way too much content? No problem! You can snooze groups as well.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
On average we scroll through 300 feet of social media content daily, according to NetNewsledger.com. Substitute 15 minutes of scrolling to customize your experience, so that each and every piece of content is something that is relevant.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Take these steps to customize your feed to make it your own personal news source full of the topics, people, and places that matter most to you. In doing so you will transform your Facebook experience from time-wasting into time well spent.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Jason Hunt is the CEO of Social Media Agency Fresh Crowd and Co- Founder of Merged Media. freshcrowd.com merged.ca&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://issuu.com/affiliatesummit/docs/feedfront_issue47" target="_blank" title="https://issuu.com/affiliatesummit/docs/feedfront_issue47"&gt;DOWNLOAD THE CURRENT ISSUE OF FEEDFRONT HERE&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;' data-image="__media/libraries/blog/Facebook.jpg" data-library-i-d="8284" data-library-name="Blog" data-library-type="template-library-blog" data-slug="blog/3-way-to-take-control-of-facebook" data-title="3 ways to take control of Facebook" style="float: left; list-style: none; position: relative; width: 346.5px;">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__wrapper">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image--cover" style="background-image: url('__media/libraries/blog/__thumbs/__500x500.Facebook.jpg');">
<a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image__link" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/3-way-to-take-control-of-facebook','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/3-way-to-take-control-of-facebook&quot;});"> <img alt="" src="__media/libraries/blog/__thumbs/__500x500.Facebook.jpg"/> </a>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header">
<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/3-way-to-take-control-of-facebook','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/3-way-to-take-control-of-facebook&quot;});">3 ways to take control of Facebook</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__date"> Aug 29, 2019 </span>
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__author"> Affiliate Summit </span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            Featured in issue 47 of FeedFront Magazine: Jason Hunt talks us through how you can control the experience you have on Facebook and avoid the time consuming 'garbage content 
          </div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__footer">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__footer__more">

</div> <script type="application/ld+json">{"Publisher":{"@type":"Organization","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/_logos/AffSum-logo-main.png"},"name":"Affiliate Summit"},"@context":"http://schema.org","image":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/libraries/blog/Facebook.jpg"},"description":"Featured in issue 47 of FeedFront Magazine: Jason Hunt talks us through how you can control the experience you have on Facebook and avoid the time consuming 'garbage content","dateModified":"2019-08-29T12:40:08Z","@type":"Article","mainEntityOfPage":{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/3-way-to-take-control-of-facebook"},"headline":"3 ways to take control of Facebook","author":[{"@type":"Person","name":"Affiliate Summit "}],"datePublished":"2019-08-29T12:31:00Z","keywords":[3,"algorithm","consuming","content","control","expect","experience","facebook","feed","friends","groups","hunt","jason","life","media","more","people","rsquore","see","social","take","tendency","through","time","up","user","want","way","ways"]}</script> </li><li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-27404 js-library-item bx-clone" data-author="Affiliate Summit" data-content-i-d="27404" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="28-Aug-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;It&amp;#39;s that time again! We are now accepting proposals for FeedFront Magazine Issue 48.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;hr /&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;Deadline - September 6, 2019&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Release date - Mid October 2019&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;Some top tips!&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;We are looking for concrete takeaways that can be applied by the readers. No fluff &amp;ndash; just useful stuff based on your experience and success.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;No ghost-written articles. We only want content from people writing from their personal industry experience.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;The content in FeedFront is &lt;strong&gt;first person&lt;/strong&gt; and articles are a &lt;strong&gt;maximum of 500 words.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;If you have previously been accepted to write an article and either failed to meet the deadline or did not adhere to the editorial guidelines, please submit your article proposal elsewhere.&lt;br /&gt;
&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://feedfront.com/propose-an-article/" target="_blank" title="https://feedfront.com/propose-an-article/"&gt;SUBMIT YOUR PROPOSAL HERE&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;img alt="Feedfront Magazine" src="__media/Feedfront-Magazine.png" style="width: 300px; height: 383px; margin-right: 40px; float: left;" /&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-two" href="https://issuu.com/affiliatesummit/docs/feedfront_issue47" target="_blank" title="https://issuu.com/affiliatesummit/docs/feedfront_issue47"&gt;Take a look at our most recent issue of FeedFront here!&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
This issue of FeedFront Magazine includes content on 3 tips to diversify your traffic channels, 10 types of subject lines that sell,&amp;nbsp;3 trends in the US coupon space and much more!&amp;nbsp;&lt;br /&gt;
&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/we-are-now-accepting-proposals-for-feedfront-magazine-issue-48','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/we-are-now-accepting-proposals-for-feedfront-magazine-issue-48&quot;});">We are now accepting proposals for FeedFront Magazine Issue 48</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__date"> Aug 28, 2019 </span>
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__author"> Affiliate Summit </span>
</div>

<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            The article proposal deadline is September 6, 2019. The next issue of FeedFront 48 will be coming out mid October 2019. 
          </div>

</div> <script type="application/ld+json">{"Publisher":{"@type":"Organization","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/_logos/AffSum-logo-main.png"},"name":"Affiliate Summit"},"@context":"http://schema.org","image":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/libraries/blog/Feedfront-Page.png"},"description":"The article proposal deadline is September 6, 2019. The next issue of FeedFront 48 will be coming out mid October 2019.","dateModified":"2019-08-28T12:05:55Z","@type":"Article","mainEntityOfPage":{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/we-are-now-accepting-proposals-for-feedfront-magazine-issue-48"},"headline":"We are now accepting proposals for FeedFront Magazine Issue 48","author":[{"@type":"Person","name":"Affiliate Summit"}],"datePublished":"2019-08-28T11:51:00Z","keywords":[2019,3,48,6,"accepted","accepting","article","articles","coming","content","deadline","experience","feedfront","guidelines","here","issue","magazine","mid","next","now","october","out","proposal","proposals","september","submit","tips"]}</script> </li>
<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-28927 js-library-item" data-author="Melissa D. Salas" data-content-i-d="28927" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="24-Oct-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What if I told you everyone could earn commissions for the sales they influence through their social posts? By Melissa D. Salas&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;EVERYONE HAS INFLUENCER&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
We all love products and services that we use on a daily basis. Or ones that have knocked us out on the first try. We may have bragged recently about such an experience by posting on social media for everyone to see. What if I told you everyone could earn commissions for the sales they influence through their social posts? You may say, &amp;ldquo;But I&amp;rsquo;m not an influencer?&amp;rdquo; Yes, you are. That&amp;rsquo;s brand advocate marketing.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;ROAD TO AUTHENTICITY&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
A brand&amp;rsquo;s best influencer is an existing customer who organically and authentically loves your brand. It&amp;rsquo;s getting back to grassroots, word-of-mouth advertising that still remains the richest path to authenticity, new customers, and a positive ROI for brands. Current customers have true influence in getting you new customers.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Everyone wants to be popular online. But, sadly, brands struggle with influencer partners having fake followers (the black-hat follower factory). However, with brand advocate marketing, you are targeting an authentic look-a-like audience that is every marketer&amp;rsquo;s dream. Smaller audiences, yes, but highly engaged and that can be influenced based on a peer recommendation. You can protect your brand from false claims when it&amp;rsquo;s your actual customer giving their testimony and product review.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;POWER OF THE PEER&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
More and more people are sharing every aspect of their lives on social media: Instagram, Facebook, and Snapchat. Significantly, some 70% of millennials prefer peer recommendations over celebrity endorsements, because they are authentic, according to Forrester. The conversions are there not only because it&amp;rsquo;s 100% authentic, but because the conversations last beyond that single post. They&amp;rsquo;re also showcasing the excitement of their experience with your brand at the gym, work, girls&amp;rsquo; night, or weekend barbeques.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;OWN YOUR CUSTOMER, OWN THE CONTENT&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Amazon, the largest internet retailer in the world and the most data-centric, had two launches last year: their influencer program and an &amp;ldquo;UPLOAD YOUR VIDEO&amp;rdquo; button on every product page. Why is this a problem for merchants? Because they are not only owning the customer, they are owning the content and paying people to drive traffic about your product to their website. But there is a way to own your customer and own the content with Indi.com.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;CUSTOMERS VALIDATE A BRAND ON SOCIAL&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Are you a new-to-market brand or a health and wellness brand? Even more so, you need your customers to become your virtual sales force and drive new customers by validating your brand on social media. When it comes to deciding if a product or service is worth trying, a friend, family member or colleague is going to believe someone they trust over an influencer/celebrity endorsement. You can scale to the masses and grow your program with the user-generated content created, because you can recruit thousands of your customers as brand advocates on social media on a performance basis.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
A solution does exist for turning your customers into loyal, content creating, social influencing affiliates. It&amp;rsquo;s called Indi.com.&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt; [FF]&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;hr /&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;img alt="Melissa Salas" src="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__resource/peopleProfiles/A22247B9-5056-B733-49F50A24FEC65E1A-profileimgupload.png" style="float: left; height: 300px; width: 300px; margin-right: 20px; margin-bottom: 20px; margin-left: 20px;" /&gt;Melissa D. Salas is the Global Brand Development &amp;amp; Marketing Director&amp;nbsp;for Indi.com, a pioneer in the Influencer,&amp;nbsp;Video &amp;amp; Affiliate&amp;nbsp;Marketing industry. Indi&amp;rsquo;s video technology platform empowers Artists, Celebrities, Influencers, Brands, Retailers and Charities to drive deep social marketing engagement &amp;amp; content commerce with consumers, creating micro-influencers. With over 16 years marketing experience, Melissa specializes in Digital Strategies, Public Relations, Affiliate Marketing, Mobile and Social Media Marketing.&amp;nbsp; Melissa has been nominated for numerous awards including &amp;ldquo;Publishers Choice&amp;rdquo; in 2015 and 2016 as well &amp;ldquo;Lifetime Achievement&amp;rdquo; in 2015. She is also a professional public speaker and Master of Ceremonies. Melissa was previously the Senior Director of Marketing for Swiss Watch International brands such as WorldofWatches.com and Smartbargains.com, the on-air personality and co-host for the Buy.com G4TV show BuyTV as well as Buy.com&amp;rsquo;s Director of Marketing &amp;amp; Public Relations.&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;FeedFront | August 2019 | No. 47&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;hr /&gt;
&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;LIKE THIS CONTENT?&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://issuu.com/affiliatesummit/docs/feedfront_issue47" target="_self" title="https://issuu.com/affiliatesummit/docs/feedfront_issue47"&gt;DOWNLOAD FEEDFRONT ISSUE 47 &lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://www.eiseverywhere.com/ereg/index.php?eventid=464203&amp;amp;reference=social" target="_blank" title="https://www.eiseverywhere.com/ereg/index.php?eventid=464203&amp;amp;reference=social"&gt;REGISTER FOR #ASW20 TODAY AND SAVE $100&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;' data-image="__media/libraries/blog/customer-best-influencer.jpg" data-library-i-d="8284" data-library-name="Blog" data-library-type="template-library-blog" data-slug="blog/your-customer-is-your-best-influencer" data-title="Your customer is your best influencer" style="float: left; list-style: none; position: relative; width: 346.5px;">

            What if I told you everyone could earn commissions for the sales they influence through their social posts? By Melissa D. Salas

</div> <script type="application/ld+json">{"Publisher":{"@type":"Organization","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/_logos/AffSum-logo-main.png"},"name":"Affiliate Summit"},"@context":"http://schema.org","image":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/libraries/blog/customer-best-influencer.jpg"},"description":"What if I told you everyone could earn commissions for the sales they influence through their social posts? By Melissa D. Salas","dateModified":"2019-10-24T09:57:10Z","@type":"Article","mainEntityOfPage":{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/your-customer-is-your-best-influencer"},"headline":"Your customer is your best influencer","author":[{"@type":"Person","name":"Melissa D. Salas"}],"datePublished":"2019-10-24T09:41:00Z","keywords":["advocate","authentic","authenticity","best","brand","brands","commissions","content","customer","customers","d","earn","everyone","experience","getting","influence","influencer","marketing","media","melissa","new","peer","posts","product","rsquos","salas","sales","social","through","told",true]}</script> </li>
<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-28871 js-library-item" data-author="Affiliate Summit" data-content-i-d="28871" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="23-Oct-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text" dir="ltr"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Do you want to meet 6,000 of the world&amp;rsquo;s top affiliate marketers, influencers, advertisers, networks and solution providers? If the answer to that question is YES, then you need to attend Affiliate Summit West 2020. This is your ONLY opportunity to network with the affiliate industry&amp;#39;s key stakeholders&amp;hellip; all under one roof.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Here are 5 reasons why I think you should attend #ASW20:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;

&lt;ol&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;/i&gt;Affiliate Summit West is the &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;BIGGEST &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;performance marketing event in the world. it is the &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;ONLY&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;place where you can connect your brand with over 6,000 attendees from the affiliate marketing industry.&lt;br /&gt;
	&lt;br /&gt;
	&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-two" href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/attending-companies?utm_source=fomo%20email&amp;amp;utm_medium=14.10.19"&gt;View the current attending companies&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
	&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;It is now easier for you to find the &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;RIGHT &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;person for your business with the launch of 1:1 meetings via our &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;NEW &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;networking initiative,&amp;nbsp;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/match-sponsor-program"&gt;MATCH!&lt;br /&gt;
	&lt;br /&gt;
	&lt;img alt="MATCH!" src="__media/MATCH1.png" style="width: 300px; height: 300px;" /&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
	&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;A completely&amp;nbsp;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;REVAMPED&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;exhibit hall with new features (games area, massage area, food stations), seating hubs, content sessions and a retail zone means more space for you to continue learning and networking.&lt;br /&gt;
	&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Better speakers and better content, (including&amp;nbsp;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/am-days-at-asw20?utm_source=fomo%20email&amp;amp;utm_medium=14.10.19"&gt;AM Days workshops&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&amp;nbsp;&amp;ndash; led by Geno Prussakov) makes #ASW20&amp;nbsp;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;ESSENTIAL&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;to attend for all those serious about Affiliate Marketing.&lt;br /&gt;
	&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;The legendary &lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/meet-market-packages?utm_source=web&amp;amp;utm_medium=email%2021.10.19"&gt;Meet Market&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&amp;hellip; which is legendary for a reason. &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Expect 6 hours of fast-paced networking&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt; which will generate hundreds of leads and (tens of) thousands of dollars in revenue&amp;hellip; last year our exhibitors said they generated over $62,000 in orders and purchases &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;DURING &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;the Meet Market.&lt;br /&gt;
	&lt;br /&gt;
	&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-two" href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/meet-market-packages" target="_blank" title="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/meet-market-packages"&gt;FIND OUR MORE ABOUT THE MEET MARKET &lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ol&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;YOU DON&amp;#39;T WANT TO MISS OUT ON ALL AND MORE... DO YOU?&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ifJN807eYVc&amp;amp;t=7s&amp;amp;utm_source=fomo%20email&amp;amp;utm_medium=14.10.19"&gt;&lt;img alt="" border="0" height="280" src="https://info.affiliatesummit.com/l/528152/2019-10-14/v8lbx/528152/217761/play_video.png" width="500" /&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;a class="ck-button-two" href="https://www.eiseverywhere.com/ereg/index.php?eventid=464203&amp;amp;reference=EBsocial" target="_blank" title="https://www.eiseverywhere.com/ereg/index.php?eventid=464203&amp;amp;reference=EBsocial"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;REGISTER FOR #ASW20 TODAY AND SAVE $100 &lt;/strong&gt; &lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;' data-image="__media/libraries/blog/Blog-Post-.png" data-library-i-d="8284" data-library-name="Blog" data-library-type="template-library-blog" data-slug="blog/5-reasons-to-attend-affiliate-summit-west-2020" data-title="5 reasons to attend Affiliate Summit West 2020" style="float: left; list-style: none; position: relative; width: 346.5px;">

<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/5-reasons-to-attend-affiliate-summit-west-2020','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/5-reasons-to-attend-affiliate-summit-west-2020&quot;});">5 reasons to attend Affiliate Summit West 2020</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__date"> Oct 23, 2019 </span>
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__author"> Affiliate Summit </span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            Make sure you register your discounted pass before Friday, October 25 before prices go up by $100! 
          </div>

</div> <script type="application/ld+json">{"Publisher":{"@type":"Organization","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/_logos/AffSum-logo-main.png"},"name":"Affiliate Summit"},"@context":"http://schema.org","image":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/libraries/blog/Blog-Post-.png"},"description":"Make sure you register your discounted pass before Friday, October 25 before prices go up by $100!","dateModified":"2019-10-23T09:43:21Z","@type":"Article","mainEntityOfPage":{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/5-reasons-to-attend-affiliate-summit-west-2020"},"headline":"5 reasons to attend Affiliate Summit West 2020","author":[{"@type":"Person","name":"Affiliate Summit"}],"datePublished":"2019-10-23T09:29:00Z","keywords":[1,100,2020,5,6000,"affiliate","area","asw20","attend","attendees","before","better","brand","business","connect","content","donrsquot","easier","event","find","january","launch","legendary","marketing","meet","meetings","miss","more","network","networking","new","now","over","person","place","reasons","register","right","summit","want","west","world"]}</script> </li>
<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-28858 js-library-item" data-author="Commission Factory" data-content-i-d="28858" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="22-Oct-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;The Commission Factory and Awin team attended their first major event at Affiliate Summit APAC after the two companies formally announced they were joining forces. On September 30th, both companies announced that Awin had taken a recent financial stake in the company as the next evolution of their successful strategic alliance&lt;/strong&gt;.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Representatives from the Commercial, Client Services, and Executive team flew from Sydney with the aim to establish new connections, meet existing partners and represent Commission Factory and Awin united!&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;img alt="WhatsApp Image 2019-10-01 at 2-44-29 PM-3" src="https://blog.commissionfactory.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Affiliate%20Summit%20APAC%202019/WhatsApp%20Image%202019-10-01%20at%202-44-29%20PM-3.jpeg?width=300&amp;amp;name=WhatsApp%20Image%202019-10-01%20at%202-44-29%20PM-3.jpeg" style="float: left; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 30px;" /&gt;Commission Factory had a productive two days at the event, with many caffeine-fuelled conversations thanks to the incredible baristas at our coffee lounge.&amp;nbsp; During the event &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;C&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;ommission Factory CEO, Zane McIntyre and Awin Global&amp;rsquo;s Business Development Direct, Sophie Metcalfe&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt; gave a presentation on the affiliate, e-commerce and digital landscape in Australia and how the adoption of technology is changing the behaviours of consumers. This theme of change and evolution was further carried through to our 3 course VIP lunch hosted by our CEO.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Meeting with publishers and advertisers, the team shared their knowledge with new and existing contacts, as well as further expanding their knowledge around the major differences and some of the changes in the next few months, that could impact the affiliate channel in the APAC region.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Each year Affiliate Summit Singapore brings together such a wide variety of delegates and attendees from across the world and from all walks of life that have insight to share with the affiliate community.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;OUR TAKEAWAYS THAT WE LEARNED OVER THE COURSE OF 2 DAYS IS:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;ul&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;The Southeast Asian (SEA) region is &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;incredibly fragmented,&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt; and most of our affiliate partners have different local contacts for each country.&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;It is an expectation that &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;brands are localised&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt; (not just shipping to the region, but also localised currencies, domains, and languages).&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Singapore will be introducing a &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;new online shopping tax&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;, effective from January 2020. It is a Goods and Services Tax (GST) imposed on imported digital services such as movie and music streaming services and mobile apps come 2020. (Source: Gartner - Singapore Will Start e-Tax on Digital Services in 2020)&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Indonesia and Thailand are the biggest markets for many publishers&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;. Consumers in these regions generally prefer local brands as opposed to large global brands, with a requirement they offer websites and creatives in local languages.&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Vietnam has a &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;strong focus on fin-tech.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Singapore and Malaysia are &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;more welcoming of global brands with an international offering;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt; however, a large portion of transactions are still completed instore.&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;The market is mobile-first&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt; when it comes to consumer purchasing online.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;

&lt;p&gt;With so many local nuances, it is vital to stay on top of your game in the market you are operating or launching in; whether through the network or your designated agency.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;ldquo;It&amp;rsquo;s fantastic to get some face time with our overseas partners. We had so many quality conversations and learned a lot from our publishers based in various countries within SEA! I&amp;rsquo;m really looking forward to coming back next year and seeing how the affiliate space continues to evolve in APAC.&amp;rdquo;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Amanda Calkins, Publisher Development Team Lead&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;img alt="Sophie Metcalfe" src="https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C5603AQHHL2Z65WWmQw/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0?e=1577318400&amp;amp;v=beta&amp;amp;t=cEB1-8LoEeqTijbUX6snSlYI6zxbzQ-BtZKZfMa9l4Y" style="float: left; height: 100px; width: 100px; margin-right: 20px; margin-bottom: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;ldquo;It was great to again share and absorb lots of learnings from our colleagues, friends, publishers, and advertisers at ASAPAC19. It&amp;#39;s always fascinating to understand other markets and understand the cultural, social and economic factors that contribute to their make up.&amp;rdquo;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Sophie Metcalfe, Business Development Director, Awin Global&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;We look forward to seeing what will happen in the next twelve months in the APAC region, as well as how the Commission Factory and Awin partnership will go from strength to strength.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;hr /&gt;
&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-two" href="https://www.commissionfactory.com/" target="_self" title="https://www.commissionfactory.com/"&gt;VISIT COMMISSION FACTORY&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-two" href="https://blog.commissionfactory.com/news-events/affiliate-summit-apac-2019?utm_source=DSMN8&amp;amp;utm_medium=LinkedIn" target="_self" title="https://blog.commissionfactory.com/news-events/affiliate-summit-apac-2019?utm_source=DSMN8&amp;amp;utm_medium=LinkedIn"&gt;SEE ORIGINAL POST&amp;nbsp;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-two" href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/asia/register-your-interest" target="_self" title="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/asia/register-your-interest"&gt;REGISTER YOUR INTEREST FOR #ASAPAC20 &lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;' data-image="__media/libraries/blog/commison-factory.PNG" data-library-i-d="8284" data-library-name="Blog" data-library-type="template-library-blog" data-slug="blog/asapac19-key-takeaways-by-commission-factory" data-title="#ASAPAC19 Key Takeaways by Commission Factory" style="float: left; list-style: none; position: relative; width: 346.5px;">

<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/asapac19-key-takeaways-by-commission-factory','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/asapac19-key-takeaways-by-commission-factory&quot;});">#ASAPAC19 Key Takeaways by Commission Factory</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__date"> Oct 22, 2019 </span>
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__author"> Commission Factory </span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            We kicked off Affiliate Summit APAC in Singapore with a bang, announcing Awin’s recent financial stake in Commission Factory and officially joining the family. 
          </div>

</div> <script type="application/ld+json">{"Publisher":{"@type":"Organization","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/_logos/AffSum-logo-main.png"},"name":"Affiliate Summit"},"@context":"http://schema.org","image":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/libraries/blog/commison-factory.PNG"},"description":"We kicked off Affiliate Summit APAC in Singapore with a bang, announcing Awin’s recent financial stake in Commission Factory and officially joining the family.\r\n","dateModified":"2019-10-22T13:48:15Z","@type":"Article","mainEntityOfPage":{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/asapac19-key-takeaways-by-commission-factory"},"headline":"#ASAPAC19 Key Takeaways by Commission Factory","author":[{"@type":"Person","name":"Commission Factory "}],"datePublished":"2019-10-22T13:33:00Z","keywords":[2020,"affiliate","announced","apac","asapac19","awin","brands","ceo","commission","companies","course","days","digital","event","evolution","factory","financial","joining","key","local","major","many","new","next","partners","publishers","recent","region","services","singapore","stake","summit","takeaways","team","two"]}</script> </li>
<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-28739 js-library-item" data-author="Susan D. Crum" data-content-i-d="28739" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="17-Oct-2019" data-description='&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;ldquo;I don&amp;rsquo;t have the money&amp;rdquo; or &amp;ldquo;I don&amp;rsquo;t have the time&amp;rdquo; or &amp;ldquo;I need to think about it&amp;rdquo; . . . do any of these sound familiar? If you&amp;rsquo;re in sales, you&amp;rsquo;ve heard these more than once. But here&amp;rsquo;s the thing. Objections are not a bad thing.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
In this article I&amp;rsquo;m going to share three strategies as a result of my expertise of turning objections into opportunities, which has allowed me to generate millions of dollars in sales from coaching packages of $1,997 to six figures.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
But first, it&amp;rsquo;s important to understand what an objection really means. &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;An objection is not a no&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;. An objection is nothing more than a prospective client trying to push their decision out into the future, usually as a result of fear or the unknown. Objections also indicate the client is engaged. As sales professionals, we have to be prepared and know what questions to ask in order to handle and get to the true core of objections.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
In order to handle any objection, you first need clarity around &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;what&amp;rsquo;s most important to them and why&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;. Then you need to ensure they are clear on &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;what their biggest challenge is, as well as their level of commitment&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;. When you help them identify those three aspects during a sales conversation and you provide a valuable solution, any objection is not a rationale solution for not taking action.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
So let&amp;rsquo;s look at &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;three proven strategies&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt; to turn those objections into opportunities, so you can begin to inspire more clients and generate more revenue.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;REGARDLESS OF THE OBJECTION&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;... always tie everything back to what&amp;rsquo;s most important to them. When you start talking about how great your product or service is you turn salesy on your client rather than supporting them from a service perspective. &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;No one likes to be sold, but most people love to be served.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;MAINTAIN CONTROL OF THE CONVERSATION&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;... stay in the conversation (don&amp;rsquo;t back off) and keep it in the present. Attempting to push a decision out into the future does not serve your client nor will it allow your client to serve others. &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Learning how to ask the right questions&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;, so together you and your client come up with a resolution, is one of the best sales techniques you can master.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;BECOME AN ACTIVE LISTENER&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;. Give your client your &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;undivided attention and acknowledge&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt; and repeat back to them from time to time to ensure you heard them correctly. Ask relevant questions to further clarify your understanding of their objection. During your sales conversation, &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;you want to listen more than talk&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;. You can&amp;rsquo;t become an active listener if you&amp;rsquo;re talking more than your client.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Objections are an inevitable part of the sales conversation. Learning how to handle objections by responding to their concerns and providing answers is critical. Once you clearly know what the real obstacle is you can handle the objection, fully support them, and together move to the next step, so your client can accomplish their goals, dreams and vision. &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;[FF]&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;hr /&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;img alt="Susan D. Crum" src="https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E03AQE5wqdphYpJSQ/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0?e=1576713600&amp;amp;v=beta&amp;amp;t=ro4hlN7ifAOTO5_ifIde7nYYVqiFWpNIgldLOncE34Y" style="float: left; height: 300px; width: 300px; margin-right: 20px; margin-bottom: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Susan D. Crum is a High-Performance Strategist and Sales Expert and is Co-Founder of Financial Acceleration Strategies, LLC.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;LIKE THIS CONTENT?&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/3-strategies-to-turn-objections-into-opportunities','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/3-strategies-to-turn-objections-into-opportunities&quot;});">3 strategies to turn objections into opportunities</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__date"> Oct 17, 2019 </span>

</div>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            Learning how to turn objections into opportunities so sales professionals can help their prospective clients reach a resolve so they can move forward. By Susan D. Crum 
          </div>

<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-28661 js-library-item" data-author="Affiliate Summit" data-content-i-d="28661" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="16-Oct-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text" style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;What better way to spend your time at Affiliate Summit West then right in the middle of the action!&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/hotel-and-venue" target="_blank" title="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/hotel-and-venue"&gt;BOOK YOUR ACCOMMODATION WITH US NOW &lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;ol&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;COST - you get a discount!&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
	All attendees wanting to stay at the Paris Las Vegas Hotel&amp;nbsp;get a discount on their accommodation. Whether for 1 or 10 people, we&amp;#39;ve got you covered! ... And no taxi&amp;#39;s back and forth = saving more money on travelling.&lt;br /&gt;
	&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;CONVENIENCE - everything is on your doorstep.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
	The hotel has the perfect location on the Las Vegas strip, filled with plenty of restaurants and bars.&amp;nbsp;Drinks receptions and parties are&amp;nbsp;less than a 10-minute drive away&amp;nbsp;and the Affiliate Ball is just a 9 minute drive away at Mandalay Bay.&lt;br /&gt;
	&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;COMFORT&lt;/strong&gt;.&amp;nbsp;&lt;br /&gt;
	Get lucky in the casinos, relax in the spas, get your workout in the Gym, get swept off your feet with exciting entertainment at one of the shows, or hit up the bars and restaurants! &amp;nbsp;&lt;br /&gt;
	&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;MEET OTHER #ASW20 ATTENDEES.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
	The majority of attendees will be staying at the Paris Las Vegas Hotel. This means you can meet old and new clients at any time! Catch up or have meetings over breakfast in the morning or go grab a&amp;nbsp;coffee downstairs - this way you don&amp;#39;t have to worry about being too busy during the conference and missing out on the opportunity to network.&lt;br /&gt;
	&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;FIRST TIME IN LAS VEGAS?&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
	Looking to catch a show, go for a walk on the strip or see what the nightlife has to offer? With the hotel being a stone&amp;rsquo;s throw away, you can go and have some fun with friends and discover&amp;nbsp;Las Vegas easily!&lt;br /&gt;
	&lt;br /&gt;
	&lt;strong&gt;Here are&amp;nbsp;our top three sites to see close to the hotel;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
	&lt;br /&gt;
	&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="https://bellagio.mgmresorts.com/en/entertainment/fountains-of-bellagio.html" target="_blank" title="https://bellagio.mgmresorts.com/en/entertainment/fountains-of-bellagio.html"&gt;Fountains of Bellagio&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;: Take in a spectacular show of magical water, music and light designed to mesmerize its admirers.&amp;nbsp;&lt;br /&gt;
	&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.cirquedusoleil.com/las-vegas" target="_blank" title="https://www.cirquedusoleil.com/las-vegas"&gt;Cirque du Soleil&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;:&amp;nbsp;Experience The Acrobatic Greatness Of&amp;nbsp;Cirque du Soleil.&lt;br /&gt;
	&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="https://vegasexperience.com/" target="_blank" title="https://vegasexperience.com/"&gt;Fremont Street&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;: Experience Downtown Las Vegas just a 10 minute drive away. Go to the Viva Vision light shows, take flight on the zipline, or have a stroll and grab a bite to eat.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ol&gt;

&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/hotel-and-venue" target="_blank" title="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/hotel-and-venue"&gt;BOOK YOUR ACCOMMODATION WITH US NOW &lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-two" href="https://www.eiseverywhere.com/ereg/index.php?eventid=464203&amp;amp;reference=blog" target="_blank" title="https://www.eiseverywhere.com/ereg/index.php?eventid=464203&amp;amp;reference=blog"&gt;REGISTER FOR #ASW20&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;PLEASE NOTE:&lt;/strong&gt; Our &lt;u&gt;&lt;strong&gt;ONLY&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/u&gt;&amp;nbsp;official supplier is Connections Housing. Companies claiming to have discounted rooms have not been vetted by us and may be scams.&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;' data-image="__media/libraries/blog/paris-las-vegas-hotel.jpg" data-library-i-d="8284" data-library-name="Blog" data-library-type="template-library-blog" data-slug="blog/5-reasons-to-stay-at-the-paris-las-vegas-hotel-for-asw20" data-title="5 reasons to stay at the Paris Las Vegas hotel for #ASW20" style="float: left; list-style: none; position: relative; width: 346.5px;">

<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header">
<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/5-reasons-to-stay-at-the-paris-las-vegas-hotel-for-asw20','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/5-reasons-to-stay-at-the-paris-las-vegas-hotel-for-asw20&quot;});">5 reasons to stay at the Paris Las Vegas hotel for #ASW20</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__date"> Oct 16, 2019 </span>
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__author"> Affiliate Summit </span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            Located on the Las Vegas Strip, the Paris Las Vegas hotel offers a range of luxurious activities, restaurants, shows, and a lot of sightseeing opportunities. 
          </div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__footer">

</div> <script type="application/ld+json">{"Publisher":{"@type":"Organization","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/_logos/AffSum-logo-main.png"},"name":"Affiliate Summit"},"@context":"http://schema.org","image":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/libraries/blog/paris-las-vegas-hotel.jpg"},"description":"Located on the Las Vegas Strip, the Paris Las Vegas hotel offers a range of luxurious activities, restaurants, shows, and a lot of sightseeing opportunities.\r\n","dateModified":"2019-10-18T08:30:56Z","@type":"Article","mainEntityOfPage":{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/5-reasons-to-stay-at-the-paris-las-vegas-hotel-for-asw20"},"headline":"5 reasons to stay at the Paris Las Vegas hotel for #ASW20","author":[{"@type":"Person","name":"Affiliate Summit"}],"datePublished":"2019-10-16T13:04:00Z","keywords":[1,10,5,9,"accommodation","affiliate","asw20","attendees","away","being","book","catch","cost","discount","doorstep","drive","everything","go","hotel","las","meet","paris","reasons","restaurants","see","show","shows","stay","strip","time","up","vegas","way"]}</script> </li>
<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-28298 js-library-item" data-author="Debra Pivko" data-content-i-d="28298" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="15-Oct-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Want to turn potential customers into paying customers? Make your subject lines truly connect with your ideal customer&amp;rsquo;s desires. By Debra Pivko&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;In the time it takes to quickly scan a restaurant menu for what to order, you&amp;rsquo;ve decided which emails are urgent, important, interesting to squeeze into your overwhelmingly busy schedule&amp;mdash;or delete.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Today&amp;rsquo;s audience is savvy to the email sales tricks of the past, so if you&amp;rsquo;re the one sending a mass email, you have to get creative&amp;hellip; Here are simple tips to make your subject lines truly connect with your ideal customer&amp;rsquo;s desires to turn potential customers into paying customers.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;1. MASTER THE &amp;#39;FROM&amp;#39; FIELD&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Research from Pinpointe Marketing found that using a personal name can increase open rates by as much as 35%. It&amp;rsquo;s surprising that a whopping 89% of email marketing campaigns are still sent from a company name. But hey, that gives you a chance to stand out.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;2. USE THE PREVIEW LINE&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Even today, many marketers aren&amp;rsquo;t aware you can write this message seen underneath the subject line. You can use it for benefits, explanation of a short subject line, or a separate offer/ idea.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;3. CREATE URGENCY&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
NO actual urgency in your offer? Create it. Even if your promo runs for a while, you can still write &amp;ldquo;today.&amp;rdquo;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;4. DISCOUNT RIGHT&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Do your calculations. I&amp;rsquo;ve had clients tell me to feature extra 10% off when the items were already on sale for 60%, which sounds WAY better. Feature what sounds best. If the highest item is 50% off, say &amp;ldquo;Want 50% off today?&amp;rdquo; You&amp;rsquo;ll get a much higher open rate.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;5. FAKE FOMO&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
The fear of missing out is a powerful motivator. Use your subject line to highlight what someone could lose. Examples: &amp;ldquo;You won!&amp;rdquo; or &amp;ldquo;Your earned credit expires tonight!&amp;rdquo;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;6.&amp;nbsp;PUSH PAIN POINTS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
People want to do more, see more, and earn more. Identify the obstacles that prevent them from doing so and use those insights to position your product or service as the solution.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;7. PERSONALIZE IT&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Addressing the recipient by name can lift open rates by 20%. For example, &amp;ldquo;Debra &amp;ndash; this outfit has your name on it!&amp;rdquo; or &amp;ldquo;Debra &amp;ndash; Can I send you these goodies?&amp;rdquo;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;8. ADD EMOJIS &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Not only do these convey emotion in little space, but they help your emails literally stand out. Use dollar signs, stars, presents, and more.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;9. BE REAL&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
A little authenticity goes a long way. If you write something a human would write to another human like &amp;ldquo;Hey, here&amp;rsquo;s a 30% off code for ya!&amp;rdquo; rather than announcing to a crowd like, &amp;ldquo;Shop our sale today&amp;rdquo;, you&amp;rsquo;re much more likely to build a rapport.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;10. CHANGE THE CONVERSATION&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Work different angles. For example, if they aren&amp;rsquo;t interested in the results you&amp;rsquo;ve seen, try getting them exited about the breakthrough ingredients or a deal. You can use subjectline.com to score &amp;lsquo;em. And test, test, test. You&amp;rsquo;ll see which messages catch the majority of people then rework your funnel to send those sooner in the journey. &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;[FF] - FeedFront | August 2019 | No. 47&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;hr /&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;img alt="Debra Pivko" src="https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E03AQE10ZFsW3Pilw/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0?e=1576713600&amp;amp;v=beta&amp;amp;t=WePGMMiQBp3beqFcQF-fvpb89kil6vj1uCygwFt4ZSU" style="float: left; margin-right: 20px; margin-bottom: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Debra Pivko, &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;Founder of IntrigueCreative.com is an experienced sales Copywriter known for high conversion rates.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;LIKE THIS CONTENT?&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-two" href="https://issuu.com/affiliatesummit/docs/feedfront_issue47" target="_self" title="https://issuu.com/affiliatesummit/docs/feedfront_issue47"&gt;DOWNLOAD FEEDFRONT ISSUE 47 &lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

            Want to turn potential customers into paying customers? Make your subject lines truly connect with your ideal customer’s desires. By Debra Pivko 
          </div>

<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-28207 js-library-item" data-author="Affiliate Summit" data-content-i-d="28207" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="10-Oct-2019" data-description='&lt;p&gt;Affiliate Summit APAC 2019 took place from October 1 -2 at the Sans Expo Centre in Singapore.&amp;nbsp;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Have you checked out the event photos on Facebook yet? &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Don&amp;#39;t forget to like, share, and tag yourself&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;.&amp;nbsp;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Here are some of our favorite photos&amp;hellip;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;widget auto="true" captions="true" contenteditable="false" controls="true" imagelib="28198" lazyload="false" librarytemplate="template-library-icatchercarouseltemplate" libtitle="Widget Type ED9837E1-C8EF-B8AF-3B2D3A31741196B2" maxslides="4" minslides="4" moveslides="1" pager="true" pause="4000" randomstart="false" rendermethodselect="renderIt,renderIt" slidemargin="20" slidewidth="450" widgetdisplayname="iCatcherCarousel" widgetname="~iCatcherCarousel" widgettype="layout" widgettypelibrary="28198"&gt;&lt;widgetinfobar contenteditable="false"&gt;&lt;i class="fa fa-ellipsis-h" contenteditable="false"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;iCatcherCarousel&lt;/widgetinfobar&gt;&lt;/widget&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://www.facebook.com/pg/AffiliateSummit/photos/?ref=page_internal" target="_blank" title="https://www.facebook.com/pg/AffiliateSummit/photos/?ref=page_internal"&gt;&lt;b&gt;VIEW ALL THE PHOTOS&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;THE NETWORKING PARTY&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;There really &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;quot;ain&amp;#39;t no party like a Webgains party&amp;quot;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;. Thanks to Webgains for helping us throw another FABULOUS party with some fantastic people, views, and cocktails.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;img alt="Party" src="__media/AS_1196.JPG" style="width: 200px; height: 133px; margin-right: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;img alt="Party" src="__media/AS_1309.JPG" style="width: 200px; height: 133px; margin-right: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;img alt="Party" src="__media/AS_1430.JPG" style="width: 200px; height: 133px; margin-right: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;img alt="Party" src="__media/AS_1348.JPG" style="width: 200px; height: 133px; margin-right: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;img alt="Exhibit Hall" src="__media/AS_1380.JPG" style="width: 200px; height: 133px; margin-right: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://www.facebook.com/AffiliateSummit/photos/?tab=album&amp;amp;album_id=10156942634573752" target="_blank" title="https://www.facebook.com/AffiliateSummit/photos/?tab=album&amp;amp;album_id=10156942634573752"&gt;VIEW ALL THE PHOTOS&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;THE CONTENT&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;From country roundtables, to the affiliate university, to our advanced tracks, our speakers covered hot topics such as mobile, publisher discovery, fraud prevention ... and so much more.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/affiliate-summit-apac-agenda" target="_blank" title="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/affiliate-summit-apac-agenda"&gt;VIEW THE 2019 AGENDA &lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;img alt="roundtable" src="__media/AS_0870.JPG" style="width: 200px; height: 133px; margin-right: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;img alt="Aff Uni" src="__media/AS_0394.JPG" style="width: 200px; height: 133px; margin-right: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;img alt="Country Roundtables" src="__media/AS_08331.JPG" style="width: 200px; height: 133px; margin-right: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;img alt="Speakers" src="__media/AS_1579.JPG" style="width: 200px; height: 133px; margin-right: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;img alt="Speakers" src="__media/AS_1922.JPG" style="width: 200px; height: 133px; margin-right: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Want to check out the keynote sessions? Head to our YouTube channel to watch back &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Steven Tan, CEO of Super Tan Brothers and&amp;nbsp;Olga Mozaiska, VP,&amp;nbsp;Head Of Online Marketing Singapore of Lazada.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sdwsPCrVkbM&amp;amp;t=1s" target="_blank" title="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sdwsPCrVkbM&amp;amp;t=1s"&gt;&lt;img alt="YouTube" src="__media/steve-youtube-2-play.png" style="width: 500px; height: 333px;" /&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Hold tight!&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&amp;nbsp;Videos are coming soon. If you purchased a Networking Plus or VIP pass, we will email you the presentations by the end of next week.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;THE EXHIBIT HALL&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Our two-day exhibition featured key affiliates, advertisers, networks and technology providers where attendees connected with the regions leading digital marketers.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/asia/exhibitor-list" target="_blank" title="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/asia/exhibitor-list"&gt;VIEW THE 2019 EXHIBITOR LIST &lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;img alt="exhibit hall" src="__media/AS_0319.JPG" style="width: 200px; height: 133px; margin-right: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;img alt="exhibit hall" src="__media/AS_0672.JPG" style="width: 200px; height: 133px; margin-right: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;img alt="Exhibit Hall" src="__media/AS_1523.JPG" style="width: 200px; height: 133px; margin-right: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;img alt="exhibit hall" src="__media/AS_1770.JPG" style="width: 200px; height: 133px; margin-right: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;img alt="exhibit hall" src="__media/AS_1719.JPG" style="width: 200px; height: 133px; margin-right: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Excited for next year?&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&amp;nbsp;Register your interest below and be the first to know when we open up registration for #ASAPAC20&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/asia/register-your-interest" target="_blank" title="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/asia/register-your-interest"&gt;I WANT TO ATTEND&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/asia/register-your-spex-interest" target="_blank" title="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/asia/register-your-spex-interest"&gt;I WANT TO EXHIBIT&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

Here are our Affiliate Summit APAC 2019 highlights</a> </h2>

</div> <script type="application/ld+json">{"Publisher":{"@type":"Organization","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/_logos/AffSum-logo-main.png"},"name":"Affiliate Summit"},"@context":"http://schema.org","image":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/libraries/blog/AS_0319.JPG"},"description":"It's #ThrowbackThursday! Check out all the highlights from Affiliate Summit APAC 2019\r\n","dateModified":"2019-10-10T10:53:36Z","@type":"Article","mainEntityOfPage":{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/another-great-show-here-are-our-affiliate-summit-apac-2019-highlights"},"headline":"Another great show! Here are our Affiliate Summit APAC 2019 highlights","author":[{"@type":"Person","name":"Affiliate Summit"}],"datePublished":"2019-10-10T09:15:00Z","keywords":[2,2019,"affiliate","another","apac","check","exhibit","great","head","hear","here","highlights","networking","next","out","party","photos","s","sessions","show","singapore","summit","tan","up","view","want","webgains","youtube"]}</script> </li>
<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-28185 js-library-item" data-author="Tom Wozniak" data-content-i-d="28185" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="09-Oct-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Writing effective email copy can be a challenging process for any marketer. With that in mind, here are three tips for writing effective email content to optimize your next campaign. By Tom Wozniak&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;ITS&amp;#39;S NOT ABOUT YOU&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Planning an email campaign starts by thinking about what you want to achieve; the new product you&amp;rsquo;re excited to promote; how the email will impact sales, etc. But, once you get to writing email content, it&amp;rsquo;s time to stop focusing on you/your company/ your product and think about your audience.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
What do they care about? It&amp;rsquo;s not the cool features of your new product, it&amp;rsquo;s the benefits it will deliver to your customer. Think about what&amp;rsquo;s in it for them. Make sure the final content is focused on what matters to your audience and you&amp;rsquo;ll go a long way toward engaging with them in your email campaign.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;THE LONG AND SHORT OF IT&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
As a general rule of thumb, email marketers try to grab their audience&amp;rsquo;s attention and quickly get to the point. Since recipient attention is limited, short and sweet is often the best approach to writing email copy. If the average recipient will only read the first few sentences of your email, then you want to get to the point in a hurry for them to convert.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
However, many successful email campaigns go in the opposite direction. Instead of keeping the email short and to the point, they write LONG emails that scroll for page after page and 90% of the content is well &amp;lsquo;below the fold&amp;rsquo;. These types of emails deliver a slow build toward the conclusion and often include repetitive sections of content, numerous testimonials, and other aspects that move a prospect through their entire customer journey in one email.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
The best advice is to really get to know your audience and how they will respond to shorter or longer messaging. Testing is a great way to dial in the right copy length for your audience.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;CLOSE THE DEAL&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
It&amp;rsquo;s possible that you&amp;rsquo;re just sending out an announcement and your goal is simply to get recipients to read the email. But, in most cases you want them to take some action after reading the email. It could be a simple as clicking a link for more information or it actually completing a purchase. In either case, the point of the email is to drive action. Still, many marketing emails fail to include a compelling call-to-action.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
In traditional sales, there&amp;rsquo;s a step called &amp;ldquo;asking for the sale,&amp;rdquo; which many salespeople consider the most difficult part of the process. It can be uncomfortable to ask someone to buy. However, in traditional sales or email marketing, you have to keep a focus on that end result and call-to-action.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Even if the campaign&amp;rsquo;s goal is to move a prospect one step further through their decision process, it is still designed to elicit a response. Always keep that in mind and it will show in your campaign results. &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;[FF]&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;hr /&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;img alt="Tom Wozniak" src="https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQFvO-zK8PiT5w/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0?e=1576108800&amp;amp;v=beta&amp;amp;t=VGlAaqcpXAvI7O-swgs0K2QA6pKlsjv9ROrCqy1FG9A" style="float: left; height: 200px; width: 200px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 30px; margin-left: 30px;" /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Tom Wozniak&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;, Executive Director of Marketing at email compliance and suppression list management company, &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;OPTIZMO&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;hr /&gt;
&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;LIKE THE CONTENT?&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://issuu.com/affiliatesummit/docs/feedfront_issue47" target="_blank" title="https://issuu.com/affiliatesummit/docs/feedfront_issue47"&gt;DOWNLOAD FEEDFRONT&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp; &amp;nbsp; &amp;nbsp; &amp;nbsp; &amp;nbsp; &amp;nbsp;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://www.eiseverywhere.com/ereg/index.php?eventid=464203&amp;amp;reference=WB1" target="_blank" title="https://www.eiseverywhere.com/ereg/index.php?eventid=464203&amp;amp;reference=WB1"&gt;REGISTER FOR #ASW20&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;' data-image="__media/libraries/blog/content.jpg.png" data-library-i-d="8284" data-library-name="Blog" data-library-type="template-library-blog" data-slug="blog/3-tips-for-writing-great-email-copy" data-title="3 tips for writing great email copy" style="float: left; list-style: none; position: relative; width: 346.5px;">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__wrapper">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image--cover" style="background-image: url('__media/libraries/blog/__thumbs/__500x500.content.jpg.png');">
<a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image__link" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/3-tips-for-writing-great-email-copy','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/3-tips-for-writing-great-email-copy&quot;});"> <img alt="" src="__media/libraries/blog/__thumbs/__500x500.content.jpg.png"/> </a>

<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/3-tips-for-writing-great-email-copy','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/3-tips-for-writing-great-email-copy&quot;});">3 tips for writing great email copy</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__date"> Oct 09, 2019 </span>
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__author"> Tom Wozniak </span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            Writing effective email copy can be a challenging process for any marketer. With that in mind, here are three tips for writing effective email content to optimize your next campaign. By Tom Wozniak 
          </div>
