By Tom Wozniak","dateModified":"2019-10-09T10:55:55Z","@type":"Article","mainEntityOfPage":{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/3-tips-for-writing-great-email-copy"},"headline":"3 tips for writing great email copy","author":[{"@type":"Person","name":"Tom Wozniak"}],"datePublished":"2019-10-09T10:40:00Z","keywords":[3,"audience","campaign","challenging","content","copy","effective","email","emails","great","here","long","many","marketer","mind","next","optimize","point","process","product","rsquos","sales","short","three","tips","tom","want","wozniak","writing"]}</script> </li>
<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-28182 js-library-item" data-author="Geno Prussakov" data-content-i-d="28182" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="08-Oct-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;The world of affiliate marketing is changing so fast, many get trapped between falling behind and trying to follow content on multiple affiliate marketing blogs and websites.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/am-days-at-asw20?utm_source=AM%20Days&amp;amp;utm_medium=email%208.10.19"&gt;AM Days&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&amp;nbsp;helps with this problem &amp;ndash; as this is where you can meet your peers and learn from the best.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&amp;gt;&amp;gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;a href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/am-days-at-asw20?utm_source=AM%20Days&amp;amp;utm_medium=email%208.10.19"&gt;Learn more about AM Days Workshops at #ASW20&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
This full-day event at&amp;nbsp;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west?utm_source=AM%20Days&amp;amp;utm_medium=email%208.10.19"&gt;Affiliate Summit West 2020&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&amp;nbsp;represents a series of in-depth workshops on affiliate marketing.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;img alt="Geno" src="https://info.affiliatesummit.com/l/528152/2019-10-08/tbhwv/528152/216351/geno.jpg" style="border-width: 0px; border-style: solid; float: left; height: 175px; width: 175px; margin-right: 20px; margin-bottom: 20px;" /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;AM Days Founder and Chair,&amp;nbsp;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/speakers/geno-prussakov?utm_source=AM%20Days&amp;amp;utm_medium=email%208.10.19"&gt;Geno Prussakov&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;, has years of experience in the industry and personally curates the workshops, to create a program&amp;nbsp;just for YOU, that yields knowledge.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;AT #ASW20, AM DAYS WORKSHOPS WILL INCLUDE:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;ul&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Advertisers Crash Course in Affiliate Marketing&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&amp;nbsp;with Geno Prussakov (targeting brands and consultants with beginner to intermediate levels of affiliate marketing experience)&lt;br /&gt;
	&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Identifying &amp;amp; Recruiting Targeted Content Partners&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&amp;nbsp;with Wade Tonkin (intended to equip advertisers/brands, affiliate managers and consultants of intermediate to advanced levels)&lt;br /&gt;
	&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Strategic Approaches to Affiliate Marketing Risk: A Legal Perspective&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&amp;nbsp;with David Adler (created for affiliates and merchants alike, regardless of the preparedness level)&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;HOW WILL AM DAYS SUPPORT ME?&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
AM Days will help you evolve and adapt to the ever-changing affiliate marketing landscape, or risk losing the game to your competition.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/am-days-at-asw20?utm_source=AM%20Days&amp;amp;utm_medium=email%208.10.19"&gt;Learn more about AM Days Workshops at #ASW20&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Whether you are already active in affiliate marketing, or you&amp;rsquo;re just investigating ways to leverage this powerful type of marketing, &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;AM Days will&amp;nbsp;equip, educate, and empower you.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Don&amp;rsquo;t miss the upcoming one on &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;January 27, 2020 in Las Vegas.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.eiseverywhere.com/ereg/index.php?eventid=481983&amp;amp;reference=8.10.19" target="_blank" title="https://www.eiseverywhere.com/ereg/index.php?eventid=481983&amp;amp;reference=8.10.19"&gt;&lt;img alt="" border="0" src="https://info.affiliatesummit.com/l/528152/2019-10-08/tbj2g/528152/216359/button_register_now__1_.png" /&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;' data-image="__media/libraries/blog/amdays_logo-hi-def.png" data-library-i-d="8284" data-library-name="Blog" data-library-type="template-library-blog" data-slug="blog/am-days-at-asw20-what-is-it--how-can-i-get-involved" data-title="AM Days at #ASW20. What is it &amp; how can I get involved" style="float: left; list-style: none; position: relative; width: 346.5px;">

<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/am-days-at-asw20-what-is-it--how-can-i-get-involved','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/am-days-at-asw20-what-is-it--how-can-i-get-involved&quot;});">AM Days at #ASW20. What is it &amp; how can I get involved</a> </h2>

</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            Whether you are already active in affiliate marketing, or you’re just investigating ways to leverage this powerful type of marketing, AM Days will equip, educate, and empower you. 
          </div>

<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-28123 js-library-item" data-author="Shawn Collins" data-content-i-d="28123" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="02-Oct-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;Jana Seitzer, owner of a marketing/communications and graphic design firm (Geek Girl Digital), and founder/editor-in-chief at WhiskynSunshine.com, joined me to chat on my podcast, This is Affiliate Marketing with Shawn Collins.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;I wanted to learn more about the real Jana, so I asked her a variety of questions I figured she had not been asked in previous interviews.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;WE DISCUSSED...&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;ul&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Working as a reporter out of college&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Having a Bad Moms Christmas party&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Bad ratings for bad archery camps&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;The meaning of her toe tattoo&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Switching from MerlotMommy.com to WhiskyNSunshine.com&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;The hallmarks of an intelligent person&lt;br /&gt;
	&amp;nbsp;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;widget content="@chev@iframe style=@quot@border: none@quot@ src=@quot@//html5-player.libsyn.com/embed/episode/id/6419720/height/90/theme/custom/thumbnail/yes/direction/forward/render-playlist/no/custom-color/000000/@quot@ height=@quot@90@quot@ width=@quot@100%@quot@ scrolling=@quot@no@quot@  allowfullscreen webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen oallowfullscreen msallowfullscreen&amp;gt;@chev@/iframe&amp;gt;" contenteditable="false" rendermethodselect="renderIt" widgetdisplayname="3rd Party Code" widgetname="Snippet" widgettype="Core"&gt;&lt;widgetinfobar contenteditable="false"&gt;&lt;i class="icon-code" contenteditable="false"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;3rd Party Code&lt;/widgetinfobar&gt;&lt;/widget&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;font color="#95a6b0"&gt;&lt;b&gt;LINKS FROM THIS WEBSITE&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;ul&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.whiskynsunshine.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank"&gt;Whisky + Sunshine&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="http://geekgirldigital.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank"&gt;Geek Girl Digital&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="https://twitter.com/whiskynsunshine/status/963086564992495617" rel="noopener" target="_blank"&gt;Bad Moms Christmas Tweet&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="https://curiousmindmagazine.com/science-says-highly-intelligent-people-messy-profane-night-owls/" rel="noopener" target="_blank"&gt;Science Confirms: Intelligent People Go To Bed Late, Leave A Mess Everywhere, And Use Bad Language&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BIJJKeahUMO/" rel="noopener" target="_blank"&gt;The toe tattoo&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;

&lt;hr /&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;img alt="Jana Seitzer" src="https://assets.libsyn.com/secure/show/81022/Jana_Seitzer.jpg" style="float: left; height: 300px; width: 300px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 30px;" /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Founder,&amp;nbsp;whiskynsunshine.com&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Jana is a savvy strategist and clever marketing communicator with extensive marketing, design, and public relations experience. She founded her first company in 1998 and offers nearly 20 years of award-winning experience in corporate communications, print &amp;amp; digital design, marketing strategy, social media strategy, and brand strategy. She&amp;rsquo;s also the proud mother of four kids, wife, a lifestyle and travel blogger, speaker, and rarely sleeps.&lt;/p&gt;' data-image="__media/libraries/blog/Jana_Seitzer.jpg" data-library-i-d="8284" data-library-name="Blog" data-library-type="template-library-blog" data-slug="blog/jana-seitzer-on-bourbon-journalism-and-a-bad-archery-class" data-title="Jana Seitzer on Bourbon, Journalism, and a Bad Archery Class" style="float: left; list-style: none; position: relative; width: 346.5px;">

</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header">
<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/jana-seitzer-on-bourbon-journalism-and-a-bad-archery-class','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/jana-seitzer-on-bourbon-journalism-and-a-bad-archery-class&quot;});">Jana Seitzer on Bourbon, Journalism, and a Bad Archery Class</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__date"> Oct 02, 2019 </span>
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__author"> Shawn Collins </span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            Jana Seitzer, owner of a marketing/communications and graphic design firm (Geek Girl Digital), and founder/editor-in-chief at WhiskynSunshine.com, joined me to chat on my podcast, This is Affiliate Marketing with Shawn Collins. 
          </div>

<li class="widget-share__list__item"> <a class="widget-share__list__item__link widget-share__list__item__link--googleplus js-share-button js-share-googleplus" data-contentid="28123" data-site="googleplus" data-slug="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/jana-seitzer-on-bourbon-journalism-and-a-bad-archery-class" href="javascript:void(0)"> <span class="widget-share__list__item__link__icon"> <i class="fa fa-google-plus"></i> </span> <span class="widget-share__list__item__link__title">Google+</span> </a> </li>
<li class="widget-share__list__item"> <a class="widget-share__list__item__link widget-share__list__item__link--email js-share-button js-share-email" data-contentid="28123" data-site="email" data-slug="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/jana-seitzer-on-bourbon-journalism-and-a-bad-archery-class" href="javascript:void(0)"> <span class="widget-share__list__item__link__icon"> <i class="fa fa-envelope-o"></i> </span> <span class="widget-share__list__item__link__title">Email</span> </a> </li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div> <script type="application/ld+json">{"Publisher":{"@type":"Organization","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/_logos/AffSum-logo-main.png"},"name":"Affiliate Summit"},"@context":"http://schema.org","image":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/libraries/blog/Jana_Seitzer.jpg"},"description":"Jana Seitzer, owner of a marketing/communications and graphic design firm (Geek Girl Digital), and founder/editor-in-chief at WhiskynSunshine.com, joined me to chat on my podcast, This is Affiliate Marketing with Shawn Collins.","dateModified":"2019-10-02T07:42:35Z","@type":"Article","mainEntityOfPage":{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/jana-seitzer-on-bourbon-journalism-and-a-bad-archery-class"},"headline":"Jana Seitzer on Bourbon, Journalism, and a Bad Archery Class","author":[{"@type":"Person","name":"Shawn Collins"}],"datePublished":"2019-10-02T07:37:00Z","keywords":["affiliate","archery","asked","bad","bourbon","chat","christmas","class","design","digital","firm","foundereditorchief","geek","girl","graphic","intelligent","jana","joined","journalism","marketing","marketingcommunications","moms","owner","podcast","seitzer","strategy","tattoo","toe","whiskynsunshinecom"]}</script> </li>
<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-28116 js-library-item" data-author="Geno Prussakov" data-content-i-d="28116" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="01-Oct-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Having attended about a hundred different conferences, including twelve of my own, I couldn&amp;rsquo;t help but observe an alarmingly recurring situation. By Geno Prussakov&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Every time I meet someone new at a conference I ask them: &amp;ldquo;What is it that you&amp;rsquo;re hoping to achieve here?&amp;rdquo;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
The intention is that their response would help me quickly figure out if we may be a match. Unfortunately, quite often I don&amp;rsquo;t get a firm or concrete answer.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
I was there, too, and I can tell you that the difference between a successful conference experience and a failed one lies more in what you do before and after it than what you do during it.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Don&amp;rsquo;t get me wrong: what you do at the conference is important, but unless you&amp;rsquo;ve come (and gone) prepared, the end result will not be the same.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
I believe that there are three specific things that conference attendees frequently miss, and I&amp;rsquo;d like to urge you to pay a special attention to these the next time you plan on attending a show.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;1. SET GOALS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Why are you going there? Is it to learn and improve, or to make new connections, or to cement existing relationships? There are no wrong answers here; but what&amp;rsquo;s important is that you do have concrete goals to reach. Otherwise, you won&amp;rsquo;t know what to aim at.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;2. STRUCTURE&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Plan the events you want to attend and schedule the meetings you want to have. Don&amp;rsquo;t count on figuring it all out once you get there. Take Affiliate Summit, for example. At an event that gathers between 5,000 and 6,000 people in one place, it is easy to get overwhelmed and lost. Come with a structured schedule, and you&amp;rsquo;ll be thankful you&amp;rsquo;ve put the time into creating one in advance.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;3. ACT&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Talking about different topic, Seena Sharp once wrote that &amp;ldquo;the real purpose&amp;rdquo; is &amp;ldquo;not to gather data&amp;rdquo; or &amp;ldquo;develop information&amp;rdquo; but &amp;ldquo;to learn and to act&amp;rdquo; and the same holds true for everything that you do after the conference. Turn the knowledge into actionable steps to improve your doing of things, and turn your new connections into new opportunities. Don&amp;rsquo;t just gather data and business cards. Apply the knowledge and act on what you&amp;rsquo;ve brought back.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
At the end of the day, it&amp;rsquo;s all about preparation. The old saying that &amp;ldquo;by failing to prepare you are preparing to fail&amp;rdquo; applies here one hundred percent. Your success is in your hands. Spend the time before the conference on setting goals and structuring your agenda, while after the conference: ensure to take action on what you&amp;rsquo;ve learned and follow up with those you&amp;rsquo;ve met. &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;[FF]&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;hr /&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;img alt="Geno Prussakov" src="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/libraries/speakers/50CF7805-5056-B733-831C7100BD27AF6E-profileimg.jpg" style="float: left; height: 400px; width: 400px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 30px;" /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;Geno Prussakov runs AM Days workshops within Affiliate Summits and AM Navigator (affiliate program management agency).&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="https://twitter.com/eprussakov" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank" title="Geno Prussakov Twitter"&gt;Prussakov&lt;/a&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;authored four affiliate marketing bestsellers (including his bestselling &amp;ldquo;Affiliate Program Management: An Hour a Day&amp;rdquo;) as well as numerous Lynda.com courses which have trained many thousands of marketing professionals worldwide.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;For influencing &amp;ldquo;change within the industry&amp;rdquo; Prussakov was named one of Performance Marketing&amp;rsquo;s Most Vocal Advocates, making a list of Rakuten&amp;rsquo;s Golden Link Awards Finalists. In 2014 and 2015 Small Business Trends recognized him as one of North America&amp;rsquo;s Top 100 small business influencers.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Geno is a regular contributor to several offline publications as well as&amp;nbsp;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="http://amnavigator.com/blog/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"&gt;his own marketing blog&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&amp;nbsp;(repeatedly named Best Affiliate Blog since 2010). He also regularly speaks at key industry trade shows, including Affiliate Summit, PerformanceIN Live, eMetrics Marketing Optimization Summit, PubCon, Influencer Marketing Days, and others.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;hr /&gt;
&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/am-days-at-asw20" target="_self" title="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/am-days-at-asw20"&gt;FIND OUT MORE ABOUT AM DAYS AT #ASW20 HERE &lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;

&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;' data-image="__media/libraries/blog/Conferences.jpg" data-library-i-d="8284" data-library-name="Blog" data-library-type="template-library-blog" data-slug="blog/how-to-make-the-most-of-conferences" data-title="How to make the most of conferences" style="float: left; list-style: none; position: relative; width: 346.5px;">

<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/how-to-make-the-most-of-conferences','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/how-to-make-the-most-of-conferences&quot;});">How to make the most of conferences</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__date"> Oct 01, 2019 </span>
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__author"> Geno Prussakov </span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            Having attended about a hundred different conferences, including twelve of my own, I couldn’t help but observe an alarmingly recurring situation. By Geno Prussakov 
          </div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__footer">

<li class="widget-share__list__item"> <a class="widget-share__list__item__link widget-share__list__item__link--linkedin js-share-button js-share-linkedin" data-contentid="28116" data-site="linkedin" data-slug="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/how-to-make-the-most-of-conferences" href="javascript:void(0)"> <span class="widget-share__list__item__link__icon"> <i class="fa fa-linkedin"></i> </span> <span class="widget-share__list__item__link__title">LinkedIn</span> </a> </li>

<li class="widget-share__list__item"> <a class="widget-share__list__item__link widget-share__list__item__link--email js-share-button js-share-email" data-contentid="28116" data-site="email" data-slug="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/how-to-make-the-most-of-conferences" href="javascript:void(0)"> <span class="widget-share__list__item__link__icon"> <i class="fa fa-envelope-o"></i> </span> <span class="widget-share__list__item__link__title">Email</span> </a> </li>

</div> <script type="application/ld+json">{"Publisher":{"@type":"Organization","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/_logos/AffSum-logo-main.png"},"name":"Affiliate Summit"},"@context":"http://schema.org","image":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/libraries/blog/Conferences.jpg"},"description":"Having attended about a hundred different conferences, including twelve of my own, I couldn’t help but observe an alarmingly recurring situation. By Geno Prussakov","dateModified":"2019-10-02T07:37:30Z","@type":"Article","mainEntityOfPage":{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/how-to-make-the-most-of-conferences"},"headline":"How to make the most of conferences","author":[{"@type":"Person","name":"Geno Prussakov"}],"datePublished":"2019-10-01T12:36:00Z","keywords":["affiliate","alarmingly","attended","business","concrete","conference","conferences","days","different","donrsquot","geno","goals","having","help","here","hundred","important","including","ldquo","make","marketing","new","observe","one","out","prussakov","recurring","rsquove","situation","summit","time","twelve","wrong"]}</script> </li>
<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-28114 js-library-item" data-author="Valeria Pagano" data-content-i-d="28114" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="30-Sep-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Amazon PPC, also known as Sponsored Products, is an advertising platform that help sellers amplify their product sales online. Here&amp;rsquo;s how to optimize your campaigns. By Valeria Pagano&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;1. THE RIGHT START&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Choose ten keywords that define your product in a unique way. This will determine the right target and categories for your campaigns. Just ten keywords will provide enough data for analysis and avoid unnecessary loss of budget. DON&amp;rsquo;T use bulk keywording, it will needlessly spread your budget. Use free tools like Sonar to check your keyword volumes.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;2. REVERSE ASIN SEARCH&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Find your competitor&amp;rsquo;s best product in your group (see Amazon&amp;rsquo;s Choice), extract the ASIN, and use tools like Sonar or Amazon-ASIN to find their keywords. The ranking indicates the best performing; include some in your campaign.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;3. YOUR FIRST KPI&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Use your margin in percentage as KPI for your ACoS and optimize each keyword based on this value. ACoS is an Amazon KPI that indicates the Advertising Cost of Sales. How to calculate it: ACoS = 100* (total ads spend / total sales). Categorize the performance of keywords as Above ACOS, Below ACOS, and Break-even ACOS. You will use them later.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;4. PLAN YOUR INITIAL BUDGET&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
...for the first 10 days (Research) of $10 to $15 per day.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;5. TRY TO RUN CAMPAIGN ALL DAY&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt; and avoid stopping them.&lt;br /&gt;
Firstly, pausing your campaign will lead to a loss of potential sales in the golden hours, such as after work. Besides every time you stop your campaigns, you have to start from scratch once you restart and you&amp;rsquo;ll lose your collected data.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;6. OPTIMIZE YOUR CAMPAIGNS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
...excluding the last three days due to the 48h delay on Seller Central stats.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;7. DON&amp;#39;T UNDERESTIMATE THE POWER OF NEGATIVE KEYWORDS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
After running campaigns on automatic for 10 days, you&amp;rsquo;ll have collected enough data to optimize keywords. Insert all nonperforming keywords (Above ACOS Keywords) in the negative keywords field as &amp;ldquo;Negative Exact Match&amp;rdquo;. Find it here: Amazon Advertising Account &amp;gt; Campaign &amp;gt; Click on Negative Keywords Tab&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;8. KEEP ON RUNNING KEYWORDS WITH BREAK-EVEN ACOS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Although you may want to insert them in negative keywords, my suggestion is to keep them running, as Amazon will continue boosting your organic ranking and traffic thanks to the golden rule: &amp;ldquo;the more sales, the better organic ranking&amp;rdquo;.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;9. ONCE YOU KNOW THE BEST PERFORMING KEYWORDS&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
...&amp;nbsp;add them to a manual campaign and focus your bid on them. Start moderately, you can scale the bid later.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;10. ADAPT THE MATCH ON THE CAMPAIGN&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Use broad and phrase match on your campaigns in a research phase, to discover which keywords perform best. Once you want to run a highly targeted campaign with your performing keywords, you can use exact match.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;11. YOUR PPC CAMPAIGNS WON&amp;#39;T BE EFFECTIVE&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
...if you don&amp;rsquo;t optimize product title, bullet points, pictures (a 1000x1000 will boost your sales), and product description. The reason is simple: if you send traffic to your product but you don&amp;rsquo;t deliver relevant content, you will just waste money.&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt; [FF]&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;hr /&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;Valeria Pagano is Head of International Partnerships at the Agency OnMaCon and an International Speaker.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;FeedFront | August 2019 | No. 47&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;' data-image="__media/libraries/blog/Amazon-PPC-V2.jpg.png" data-library-i-d="8284" data-library-name="Blog" data-library-type="template-library-blog" data-slug="blog/11-tips-to-dominate-amazon-ppc" data-title="11 Tips to Dominate Amazon PPC" style="float: left; list-style: none; position: relative; width: 346.5px;">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__wrapper">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image--cover" style="background-image: url('__media/libraries/blog/__thumbs/__500x500.Amazon-PPC-V2.jpg.png');">
<a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image__link" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/11-tips-to-dominate-amazon-ppc','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/11-tips-to-dominate-amazon-ppc&quot;});"> <img alt="" src="__media/libraries/blog/__thumbs/__500x500.Amazon-PPC-V2.jpg.png"/> </a>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header">
<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/11-tips-to-dominate-amazon-ppc','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/11-tips-to-dominate-amazon-ppc&quot;});">11 Tips to Dominate Amazon PPC</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__date"> Sep 30, 2019 </span>
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__author"> Valeria Pagano </span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            Amazon PPC, also known as Sponsored Products, is an advertising platform that help sellers amplify their product sales online. Here’s how to optimize your campaigns. By Valeria Pagano 
          </div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__footer">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__footer__more">

<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-28022 js-library-item" data-author="Sara Szado" data-content-i-d="28022" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="25-Sep-2019" data-description='&lt;p&gt;&lt;img alt="Sara" src="https://info.affiliatesummit.com/l/528152/2019-09-23/rqq7n/528152/212829/IMG_3643.JPG" style="float: left; height: 267px; width: 400px; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 30px;" /&gt;Hi, I&amp;#39;m&amp;nbsp;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/sara-szado-69a7193b/"&gt;Sara Szado&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;, Client Success Manager and organizer of the Affiliate Summit Running Club.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
At Affiliate Summit we know that affiliate marketing is the name of the game, but we also believe it&amp;#39;s equally important to maintain a healthy lifestyle.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
With that in mind we will be hosting a&amp;nbsp;fitness challenge using the app&amp;nbsp;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="http://mapmyfitness.com/"&gt;MapMyFitness&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
All participants who log &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;50 miles or more &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;(whether it be cycling, fitness classes, running, swimming, or walking) will each receive a&amp;nbsp;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;complimentary Networking Pass to #ASW20&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;.&amp;nbsp;The ten&amp;nbsp;participants with the&amp;nbsp;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;greatest number of&amp;nbsp;miles at the end of the challenge will receive a VIP Pass.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;The challenge runs&amp;nbsp;Wednesday, September 25 through to Saturday, November 23.&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
MapMyFitness is an app that will automatically sync with your account on&amp;nbsp;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="http://mapmyfitness.com/"&gt;MapMyFitness.com&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;. If you don&amp;rsquo;t have an account yet, don&amp;rsquo;t fret, setting up an account is totally&amp;nbsp;free.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Now, we all like a good win fair and square, so don&amp;rsquo;t fudge your numbers.&amp;nbsp;Post as you do the exercise, rather than bulk posting at the end.&amp;nbsp;We want to see your journey so we can be with you along the way.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Sounds great,&amp;nbsp;how can I get involved?&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;To participate you will need to download MapMyFitness and send our team an email&amp;nbsp;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="mailto:support@affiliatesummit.com?subject=ASW20%20-%20Exercise%20to%20win%20a%20free%20pass"&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&amp;nbsp;and we will invite you to the challenge. Should you have any questions please reach out to me directly&amp;nbsp;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="mailto:sara@affiliatesummit.com"&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&amp;nbsp;or Skype at live:sara_14196.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
I would ALSO like to invite all the participants to join me in Las Vegas for&amp;nbsp;daily morning runs&amp;nbsp;&lt;i&gt;(more information coming soon).&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;img alt="Running Club" src="__media/DSC_7667.jpg" style="width: 400px; height: 601px;" /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;The running club members at #ASE19&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/exercise-to-earn-a-free-pass-to-affiliate-summit-west-2020','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/exercise-to-earn-a-free-pass-to-affiliate-summit-west-2020&quot;});">Exercise to Earn a Free Pass to Affiliate Summit West 2020</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__date"> Sep 25, 2019 </span>
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__author"> Sara Szado </span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            At Affiliate Summit we know that affiliate marketing is the name of the game, but we also believe it's equally important to maintain a healthy lifestyle. 
          </div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__footer">

<li class="widget-share__list__item"> <a class="widget-share__list__item__link widget-share__list__item__link--linkedin js-share-button js-share-linkedin" data-contentid="28022" data-site="linkedin" data-slug="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/exercise-to-earn-a-free-pass-to-affiliate-summit-west-2020" href="javascript:void(0)"> <span class="widget-share__list__item__link__icon"> <i class="fa fa-linkedin"></i> </span> <span class="widget-share__list__item__link__title">LinkedIn</span> </a> </li>

<li class="widget-share__list__item"> <a class="widget-share__list__item__link widget-share__list__item__link--email js-share-button js-share-email" data-contentid="28022" data-site="email" data-slug="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/exercise-to-earn-a-free-pass-to-affiliate-summit-west-2020" href="javascript:void(0)"> <span class="widget-share__list__item__link__icon"> <i class="fa fa-envelope-o"></i> </span> <span class="widget-share__list__item__link__title">Email</span> </a> </li>

</div> <script type="application/ld+json">{"Publisher":{"@type":"Organization","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/_logos/AffSum-logo-main.png"},"name":"Affiliate Summit"},"@context":"http://schema.org","image":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/libraries/blog/running.jpg"},"description":"At Affiliate Summit we know that affiliate marketing is the name of the game, but we also believe it's equally important to maintain a healthy lifestyle.\r\n","dateModified":"2019-09-24T11:53:28Z","@type":"Article","mainEntityOfPage":{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/exercise-to-earn-a-free-pass-to-affiliate-summit-west-2020"},"headline":"Exercise to Earn a Free Pass to Affiliate Summit West 2020","author":[{"@type":"Person","name":"Sara Szado"}],"datePublished":"2019-09-25T10:00:00Z","keywords":[2020,"account","affiliate","believe","challenge","donrsquot","earn","equally","exercise","free","game","healthy","important","know","lifestyle","maintain","marketing","name","pass","running","summit","west"]}</script> </li>
<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-28024 js-library-item" data-author="Affiliate Summit" data-content-i-d="28024" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="24-Sep-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;With almost all US internet users redeeming coupons, we are seeing use increasing across all age groups and demographics stateside. While print offers remain popular, digital deals are taking up increasing space in the market. By Dan Cohen&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Here are three trends that US advertisers and affiliate networks should keep an eye out for in the coming months.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Media Houses Entering the Coupon Market&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
In the last year, we have seen premium media houses entering the US coupon space through the use of white label partners. Publishers are jumping on this opportunity. It draws in a new audience and provides an incremental revenue stream without interrupting the experience of their core readers.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Advertisers also benefit because they are able to boost their visibility and achieve their business goals through brand-safe channels. This is a successful, proven business model in Europe, and we expect to see this type of solution rise to prominence in the US market, too.&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;Targeting Digital Deals to Match Real-Time Needs&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
With today&amp;rsquo;s consumers conducting more of their lives online, and offline spaces taking on a digital dimension, the boundaries between the two worlds are becoming increasingly blurred. Coupon publishers are in a great position to harness this wider trend by offering services such as proximity triggered deals. These deals can be served directly to a consumer&amp;rsquo;s mobile device via an app when they come within range of a predetermined location.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;For example, a shopper who is passing a grocery store could receive a time-limited coupon for that day&amp;rsquo;s special offers. Or, a consumer who checks into a hotel or travels to a new destination could potentially be offered coupons for goods and services in that area, such as theme parks or food. In these ways, coupon offerings can be more tailored to consumer&amp;rsquo;s needs.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Digital Coupons for Grocery Shopping&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
According to industry estimates, online grocery sales will be the fastest growing vertical in the US in 2019. The food and beverages category is set to grow to over $19 billion this year. Money-saving coupons have long-standing appeal for grocery shopper and the use of digital coupons in this category is also growing.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Keeping in mind, online grocery shoppers tend to be younger, affluent, city-dwelling consumers, and they are more likely to embrace new developments in technology. As we see more and more US consumers choosing to do their food shopping online, this provides new opportunities for advertisers to woo savvy shoppers.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;An increasingly time-pressed and financially cautious generation of smart shoppers are always eager for a great deal; coupon publishers are ideally placed to deliver. &lt;strong&gt;[FF]&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;img alt="Dan" src="__media/dan-cohen.jpg" style="width: 300px; height: 200px; float: left; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 30px;" /&gt;Dan Cohen is the Group Commercial Director at Savings United, coupon partner of premium publishers.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;FeedFront | August 2019 | No. 47&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://issuu.com/affiliatesummit/docs/feedfront_issue47" target="_blank" title="https://issuu.com/affiliatesummit/docs/feedfront_issue47"&gt;DOWNLOAD FEEDFRONT ISSUE 47 HERE&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;' data-image="__media/libraries/blog/Coupons-and-discounts.jpg" data-library-i-d="8284" data-library-name="Blog" data-library-type="template-library-blog" data-slug="blog/3-trends-is-the-us-coupon-space" data-title="3 trends is the US coupon space" style="float: left; list-style: none; position: relative; width: 346.5px;">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__wrapper">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image--cover" style="background-image: url('__media/libraries/blog/__thumbs/__500x500.Coupons-and-discounts.jpg');">
<a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image__link" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/3-trends-is-the-us-coupon-space','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/3-trends-is-the-us-coupon-space&quot;});"> <img alt="" src="__media/libraries/blog/__thumbs/__500x500.Coupons-and-discounts.jpg"/> </a>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header">
<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/3-trends-is-the-us-coupon-space','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/3-trends-is-the-us-coupon-space&quot;});">3 trends is the US coupon space</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__date"> Sep 24, 2019 </span>
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__author"> Affiliate Summit </span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            With almost all US internet users redeeming coupons, we are seeing use increasing across all age groups and demographics stateside. While print offers remain popular, digital deals are taking up increasing space in the market. By Dan Cohen 
          </div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__footer">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__footer__more">

</div> <script type="application/ld+json">{"Publisher":{"@type":"Organization","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/_logos/AffSum-logo-main.png"},"name":"Affiliate Summit"},"@context":"http://schema.org","image":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/libraries/blog/Coupons-and-discounts.jpg"},"description":"With almost all US internet users redeeming coupons, we are seeing use increasing across all age groups and demographics stateside. While print offers remain popular, digital deals are taking up increasing space in the market. By Dan Cohen","dateModified":"2019-09-24T12:41:50Z","@type":"Article","mainEntityOfPage":{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/3-trends-is-the-us-coupon-space"},"headline":"3 trends is the US coupon space","author":[{"@type":"Person","name":"Affiliate Summit"}],"datePublished":"2019-09-24T12:24:00Z","keywords":[3,"advertisers","age","cohen","consumers","coupon","coupons","dan","deals","demographics","digital","food","grocery","groups","increasing","internet","market","more","new","offers","online","popular","print","publishers","redeeming","remain","seeing","shoppers","space","stateside","taking","trends","up","use","users"]}</script> </li>
<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-27957 js-library-item" data-author="Nele Sharp" data-content-i-d="27957" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="19-Sep-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Online shoppers are increasingly buying from global e-commerce sites, in addition to sites in their own country. Nearly all (96%) of the retail advertisers in CJ Affiliate&amp;rsquo;s network have seen website visitors from other countries this year. By Nele Sharp&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;The rise in cross-border shopping creates a wealth of opportunities for retailers who want to grow their global market share of both new and existing customers&amp;mdash;wherever they are located. It&amp;rsquo;s a smart strategy, particularly when e-commerce growth in your domestic market is reaching maturity.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
To succeed on a global scale, it is important to understand what drives the cross-border consumer. These shoppers are price-sensitive and it&amp;rsquo;s often cheaper for them to buy imported goods. They also value authenticity and want to know they&amp;rsquo;re getting the real thing. With that in mind, the following are four ways to win the cross-border consumer:&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;GLOBAL PAYMENT &amp;amp; INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING OPTIONS&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Cross-border shoppers will accept shipping delays to get what they want from retailers outside their market, but they expect to have global payment options. In addition to ensuring international shipping options are prominent on your site and easy to understand, non-domestic brands should consider offering competitive shipping rates, running free shipping promotions, or accommodating freight forwarding.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;SOCIAL MEDIA INFLUENCE MATTERS&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Cross-border shoppers want more than just a good deal&amp;mdash;they need validation from peers and influencers. Today&amp;rsquo;s consumers are bombarded with brand messages and often turn to influencers for inspiration and advice. Influencers are extremely powerful in helping brands break through the clutter and establish credibility, which is particularly important for brands entering a new market. Even if the social media stars are not directly selling the product, they heavily influence purchasing decisions. One of the best-known examples is fashion blogger Becky Li, who has more than 3 million followers on WeChat and sold 100 Mini Cooper cars on her blog in just five minutes.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;GLOBAL SHOPPING EVENTS&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Major retail events such as Black Friday, Cyber Monday, Amazon&amp;rsquo;s Prime Day, and Single&amp;rsquo;s Day attract global shoppers to shop online and can be great way to get massive exposure for a brand among&amp;nbsp;new audiences. Affiliate publishers are smart marketers and will optimize their sites and apps for these events to promote additional brands and stores. Retailers can take advantage of this by offering higher commissions and media placement to their top affiliate publishers and influencers. Set up competitive offers that will catch the attention of the cross border shopper, otherwise they may not be interested because of great domestic offers.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;MOBILE IS A MUST &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Due to heavy mobile phone ownership and usage rates, mobile phones are the primary device used for ecommerce across the globe. This goes hand in hand with the trend that consumers will spend more time watching digital videos. The key to launching a successful global strategy is partnering with publishers who know the mobile ad space in any given region. For example, partner with publishers who know how to promote a products using WeChat and understand the ever-growing trend of QR codes. &lt;strong&gt;[FF]&amp;nbsp;August 2019 | No. 47&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;img alt="Nele Sharp" src="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__resource/peopleProfiles/F8D2ABC-B44F-4545-BC55-C449F6EFDE81-profileimgupload.png" style="height: 100px; width: 100px; float: left; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 30px;" /&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Nele Sharp is a Director at CJ Affiliate and leads the company&amp;rsquo;s global publisher development team.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://issuu.com/affiliatesummit/docs/feedfront_issue47" target="_blank" title="https://issuu.com/affiliatesummit/docs/feedfront_issue47"&gt;DOWNLOAD FEEDFRONT MAGAZINE ISSUE 47&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;' data-image="__media/libraries/blog/Cross-Border-eCommerce.jpg" data-library-i-d="8284" data-library-name="Blog" data-library-type="template-library-blog" data-slug="blog/4-ways-to-win-the-cross-border-consumer" data-title="4 ways to win the cross-border consumer" style="float: left; list-style: none; position: relative; width: 346.5px;">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__wrapper">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image--cover" style="background-image: url('__media/libraries/blog/__thumbs/__500x500.Cross-Border-eCommerce.jpg');">

<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header">
<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/4-ways-to-win-the-cross-border-consumer','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/4-ways-to-win-the-cross-border-consumer&quot;});">4 ways to win the cross-border consumer</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__date"> Sep 19, 2019 </span>
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__author"> Nele Sharp </span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            Online shoppers are increasingly buying from global ecommerce sites, in addition to sites in their own country. Nearly all (96%) of the retail advertisers in CJ Affiliate’s network have seen website visitors from other countries this year. By Nele Sharp

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;HOW CAN I GET IN TOUCH?&lt;/strong&gt; Download the official networking&amp;nbsp;app! Open to all attendees, you can use the app to schedule one to one meetings, message each other, view the exhibitor and sponsor list, as well as the full conference agenda.&amp;nbsp;Haven&amp;#39;t got an invite?&amp;nbsp;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="mailto:support@affiliatesummit.com?Subject=ASE19%20App%20download" target="_top" title="support@affiliatesummit.com"&gt;Contact us and we&amp;#39;ll sort this out right away!&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

	&lt;tbody&gt;

			&lt;td&gt;Networking Plus and VIPs only&lt;/td&gt;
			&lt;td&gt;
			&lt;p&gt;Meet up with key experts to discuss the latest challenges and innovation&amp;#39;s in the space. You must sign up via the App! We only have 30 spaces so select a session and click &amp;quot;Add to Schedule&amp;quot;&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;u&gt;DAY 1&lt;/u&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;strong&gt;Singapore &lt;/strong&gt;- 1pm - Led by&amp;nbsp;Christine Chua, Regional Marketing Manager - HP&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;strong&gt;Australia &lt;/strong&gt;- 2pm - Led by&amp;nbsp;Sophie Metcalfe, Business Development Director - Awin&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;strong&gt;China &lt;/strong&gt;- 3pm - Led by&amp;nbsp;Ami Spencer, Group Head of Network Development - Webgains&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;strong&gt;Philippines &lt;/strong&gt;- 4pm - Led by&amp;nbsp;Ayush Goyal, Managing Director-SEA &amp;amp;&amp;nbsp;Melissa Francisco, Head of Sales &amp;amp; Business Development SEA - Optimise&lt;/p&gt;

			&lt;p&gt;&lt;u&gt;DAY 2&lt;/u&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;strong&gt;Malaysia &lt;/strong&gt;- 1:30pm - Led by&amp;nbsp;Cris Tan, Regional Business Development Director - Involve Asia&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;strong&gt;Vietnam &lt;/strong&gt;- 2:30pm&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

			&lt;p&gt;Location: Track B&lt;/p&gt;
			&lt;/td&gt;
		&lt;/tr&gt;
		&lt;tr&gt;
			&lt;td style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Affiliate Summit Happy Hour - Sponsored by Groupon&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;img alt="Groupon" src="__media/groupon-300.png" style="width: 150px; height: 150px;" /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
			&lt;td&gt;All pass types&lt;/td&gt;
			&lt;td&gt;
			&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Beers on Groupon&lt;/strong&gt;! Come and grab an ice cold beer at the exhibit hall bar and hang network with your new friends you have made&lt;/p&gt;

			&lt;p&gt;Day 1&amp;nbsp;&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;strong&gt;Location&lt;/strong&gt;: Exhibition Floor&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;strong&gt;Time&lt;/strong&gt;: 5pm - 7pm&lt;/p&gt;

			&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

			&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

			&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
			&lt;/td&gt;
		&lt;/tr&gt;
		&lt;tr&gt;
			&lt;td style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Food Crawl&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
			&lt;td&gt;All pass types&lt;/td&gt;
			&lt;td&gt;
			&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Experience the culinary delights&lt;/strong&gt; of South East Asia through our NEW food crawl!&lt;br /&gt;
			(VIPs: Hot buffet in the VIP lounge)&lt;/p&gt;

			&lt;p&gt;Day 2&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;strong&gt;Location&lt;/strong&gt;: Exhibition Floor&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;strong&gt;Time&lt;/strong&gt;: 12:30&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;
			&lt;/td&gt;
		&lt;/tr&gt;
	&lt;/tbody&gt;
&lt;/table&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp; &amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp; &amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;font color="#95a6b0"&gt;&lt;b&gt;HOW ABOUT THE NETWORKING PARTIES?&amp;nbsp;&lt;/b&gt;&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Just like last year, we have our official after party and early badge collecting to keep the networking going!&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;table border="1" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="5" style="width: 100%;"&gt;
	&lt;tbody&gt;
		&lt;tr&gt;
			&lt;td style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Early Badge Pick-Up and Welcome Drinks&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
			&amp;nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;
			&lt;td&gt;All pass types&lt;/td&gt;
			&lt;td&gt;
			&lt;p&gt;Beat the queue at registration and join us before the show to grab your badge, have a drink, and do some networking!&lt;/p&gt;

			&lt;p&gt;Details coming soon.&lt;/p&gt;
			&lt;/td&gt;
		&lt;/tr&gt;
		&lt;tr&gt;
			&lt;td style="text-align: center;"&gt;
			&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Official After Paty Sponsored by Webgains&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

			&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;img alt="lantern" src="__media/lantern-banner.png" style="width: 250px; height: 125px;" /&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
			&lt;/td&gt;
			&lt;td&gt;All pass types&lt;/td&gt;
			&lt;td&gt;
			&lt;p&gt;Put your dancing shoes on as we continue the fun and networking over at one of Singapore&amp;#39;s best rooftop bars. Can we top last years entertainment with a snake charmer?!&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

			&lt;p&gt;Day 1&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;strong&gt;Location&lt;/strong&gt;: Lantern Rooftop Bar&amp;nbsp;&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;strong&gt;Time&lt;/strong&gt;: 9pm onwards&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;br /&gt;
			&lt;strong&gt;INVITE ONLY.&lt;/strong&gt; RSVP required. No invite, no entry.&lt;/p&gt;
			&lt;/td&gt;
		&lt;/tr&gt;
	&lt;/tbody&gt;

<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/all-the-ways-to-network-at-asapac19','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/all-the-ways-to-network-at-asapac19&quot;});">All the ways to network at #ASAPAC19</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__date"> Sep 18, 2019 </span>
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__author"> Affiliate Summit </span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            To make sure all attendees at Affiliate Summit APAC 2019 have a productive 2 days meeting old and new clients, we have put together a full list detailing all the ways to network! 
          </div>

<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-27803 js-library-item" data-author="Affiliate Summit" data-content-i-d="27803" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="12-Sep-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;We&amp;rsquo;re thrilled to announce that Steve Tan, CEO of Super Tan Brothers will be joining us at Affiliate Summit APAC 2019 in October.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;img alt="Steve Tan" src="__media/steve-tan-600.png" style="width: 400px; height: 400px; float: left; margin-right: 30px; margin-bottom: 30px;" /&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/asia/keynote-speakers?utm_source=keynote%20email&amp;amp;utm_medium=email"&gt;&amp;gt;&amp;gt; VIEW HIS FULL PROFILE&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Not a stranger to the industry, &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Steve is a Singapore serial entrepreneur&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt; with over 13 years of ecommerce and digital marketing experience.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Steve and his brother have sold over $100 million worth of products from their ecommerce stores, including one that has generated over $6.2 million in a single month.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Pretty impressive, right?!&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Steve shares&amp;nbsp;his knowledge through international events and his private masterminds retreats. He and his brother have ALSO shared the stage with &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Neil Patel, Ryan Deiss, and Ezra Firestone&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&amp;hellip;.all of whom have been keynote speakers at Affiliate Summit shows.&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;i&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;But wait ... there&amp;#39;s more!&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
Steve will ALSO be answering your questions in our &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Q&amp;amp;A session in the VIP Lounge (Day 1, 1pm).&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="http://www.eiseverywhere.com/ereg/newreg.php?eventid=415321&amp;amp;reference=12919" target="_blank" title="http://www.eiseverywhere.com/ereg/newreg.php?eventid=415321&amp;amp;reference=12919"&gt;&amp;gt;&amp;gt; BUY YOUR VIP PASS HERE&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;He&amp;rsquo;s not the only fantastic speaker who will be taking the stage. You will also hear from other experts such as:&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;ul&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Bryan Loh, Affiliate Manager, &lt;strong&gt;FOREO&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;David Zhao, Marketing Partnership &amp;amp; Affiliate Lead APAC &amp;amp; EMEA, &lt;strong&gt;Airbnb&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Sophie Metcalfe, Business Development Director, &lt;strong&gt;Awin&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Rizal Wisnu Prasetya, Regional Associate Manager, Affiliate, &lt;strong&gt;ZALORA SEA&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Valeria Bondar, Senior Affiliates &amp;amp; Partnerships Executive, &lt;strong&gt;Farfetch&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/asia/apac-speakers?utm_source=keynote%20email&amp;amp;utm_medium=email"&gt;&amp;gt;&amp;gt; View all the speakers&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
So.. you&amp;#39;ve made it this far. Now for the best part. To celebrate Steve Tan joining us in Singapore our&amp;nbsp;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;FLASH SALE WITH 25% off&amp;nbsp;passes begins NOW!&amp;nbsp;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;i&gt;*only valid until Friday, Sep 13, 12am SGT&lt;br /&gt;
*only valid on new registrations&lt;/i&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://www.eiseverywhere.com/ereg/newreg.php?eventid=415321&amp;amp;reference=12919"&gt;&amp;gt;&amp;gt; Register your pass here with your code STEVETAN25OFF&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;' data-image="__media/libraries/blog/Steve-Tan-Banner-V2.png" data-library-i-d="8284" data-library-name="Blog" data-library-type="template-library-blog" data-slug="blog/announced-steve-tan-joins-us-at-the-keynote-speaker-at-affiliate-summit-apac-2019" data-title="ANNOUNCED: Steve Tan joins us at the keynote speaker at Affiliate Summit APAC 2019" style="float: left; list-style: none; position: relative; width: 346.5px;">

<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/announced-steve-tan-joins-us-at-the-keynote-speaker-at-affiliate-summit-apac-2019','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/announced-steve-tan-joins-us-at-the-keynote-speaker-at-affiliate-summit-apac-2019&quot;});">ANNOUNCED: Steve Tan joins us at the keynote speaker at Affiliate Summit APAC 2019</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">

<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__author"> Affiliate Summit </span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            We’re thrilled to announce that Steve Tan, CEO of Super Tan Brothers will be joining us at Affiliate Summit APAC 2019 in October.

<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-27805 js-library-item" data-author="Affiliate Summit" data-content-i-d="27805" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="10-Sep-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Missy Ward, Co-Founder of Affiliate Summit and too many other things to list, joins Shawn Collins to chat on his podcast, This is Affiliate Marketing.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;widget content="@chev@iframe style=@quot@border: none@quot@ src=@quot@//html5-player.libsyn.com/embed/episode/id/5361438/height/90/theme/custom/thumbnail/yes/direction/forward/render-playlist/no/custom-color/000000/@quot@ height=@quot@90@quot@ width=@quot@100%@quot@ scrolling=@quot@no@quot@  allowfullscreen webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen oallowfullscreen msallowfullscreen&amp;gt;@chev@/iframe&amp;gt;" contenteditable="false" rendermethodselect="renderIt" widgetdisplayname="3rd Party Code" widgetname="Snippet" widgettype="Core"&gt;&lt;widgetinfobar contenteditable="false"&gt;&lt;i class="icon-code" contenteditable="false"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;3rd Party Code&lt;/widgetinfobar&gt;&lt;/widget&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;When I started this podcast, I knew I&amp;#39;d hit episode 50 in 2017, after Missy had turned 50, so I figured I&amp;#39;d wait until I reached the golden anniversary episode to ask Missy to join me.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Episode 50&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;: I wanted to learn more about the real Missy,&amp;nbsp;so I asked her a variety of questions I figured she had not been asked in previous interviews.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;We discussed...&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;ul&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;The latest AVON 39 The Walk to End Breast Cancer in Washington, DC&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Meeting Patrick &amp;quot;McDreamy&amp;quot; Dempsey a couple times&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Her video review of a Keurig that has gotten nearly 50k views&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Why she likes John Tesh&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;The origin of her company name, Vasbyt&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Whether she can still find original Coast Soap&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;Being endorsed on LinkedIn for wine and fundraising&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Links from this episode&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;ul&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/missyward/" target="_blank"&gt;Missy on LinkedIn&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="https://twitter.com/missyward" target="_blank"&gt;Missy on Twitter&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;

	&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.facebook.com/missyward" target="_blank"&gt;Missy on Facebook&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
	&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href="http://www.missyward.com/" target="_blank"&gt;MissyWard.com&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;

<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/missy-ward-on-john-tesh-fortified-wine-and-meeting-patrick-dempsey','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/missy-ward-on-john-tesh-fortified-wine-and-meeting-patrick-dempsey&quot;});">This Is Affiliate Marketing: Missy Ward on John Tesh, Fortified Wine, and Meeting Patrick Dempsey</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__date"> Sep 10, 2019 </span>
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__author"> Affiliate Summit </span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            Missy Ward, Co-Founder of Affiliate Summit and too many other things to list, joins Shawn Collins to chat on his podcast, This is Affiliate Marketing. 
          </div>

</div> <script type="application/ld+json">{"Publisher":{"@type":"Organization","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/_logos/AffSum-logo-main.png"},"name":"Affiliate Summit"},"@context":"http://schema.org","image":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/__media/libraries/blog/Missy_Ward.jpg"},"description":"Missy Ward, Co-Founder of Affiliate Summit and too many other things to list, joins Shawn Collins to chat on his podcast, This is Affiliate Marketing.\r\n\r\n","dateModified":"2019-09-10T14:43:22Z","@type":"Article","mainEntityOfPage":{"@type":"WebPage","@id":"https://www.affiliatesummit.com/blog/missy-ward-on-john-tesh-fortified-wine-and-meeting-patrick-dempsey"},"headline":"This Is Affiliate Marketing: Missy Ward on John Tesh, Fortified Wine, and Meeting Patrick Dempsey","author":[{"@type":"Person","name":"Affiliate Summit"}],"datePublished":"2019-09-11T10:00:00Z","keywords":[50,"affiliate","chat","cofounder","collins","dempsey","episode","fortified","john","joins","list","many","marketing","meeting","missy","patrick","podcast","shawn","summit","tesh","things","ward","wine"]}</script> </li>
<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-27802 js-library-item" data-author="Affiliate Summit" data-content-i-d="27802" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="10-Sep-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;One of the most important aspects of conversion enhancement is personalizing the shopping experience. Through personalization, you help streamline conversions for the advertiser. By Jonathan Goodwin&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;ldquo;The percentage of abandoned carts ranges anywhere from 50% to 80%,&amp;rdquo; &amp;ndash; Annex Cloud.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Oftentimes, advertisers or affiliates are driving significant amounts of traffic to a site, but when a user makes it to the cart or checkout stages, there are no abandonment strategies in place. When the user shows abandonment intent at these stages, it&amp;rsquo;s best to engage users with personalized messaging or incentives that get them back on track.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;There are many engagements retailers can use to recover abandoning shoppers - the success lies in matching the engagements and messaging to the customer journey. When there is a clear, personalized path leading the customer down the funnel, retailers see greater results in the form of purchases.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Here are &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;five ways to personalize messaging and engagements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt; to get abandoning customers back on track:&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;USE SOCIAL PROOF:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
When a shopper has an item in their cart and goes to abandon, launch unique messaging that emphasizes what other customers love about the product. Since that shopper already has an interest in an item, all they may need is a little social proof push back along the path to conversion.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;OFFER AN INCENTIVE:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
One of the most common abandonment strategies is offering an incentive. Since some visitors would prefer a discount on their items, presenting those that show true abandonment intent with a unique incentive is enough to pivot them to purchase.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;USE DIFFERENT TARGETING METHODS: &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;If the goal is to increase your new-to-file (NTF) percentage, targeting specific traffic segments with separate messaging could be the best option. Since new customers respond to different strategies than returning customers, customizing the strategies and messaging to match their respective needs may improve conversion rates and lifetime value of customers.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;DISPLAY DYNAMIC PRODUCT RECOMMENDATIONS:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
You know what customers are already buying, so leverage browsing behaviors and purchase patterns to increase average order values. By implementing a series of personalized recommendations, you can increase the profit per visit by driving larger purchases.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;span class="ck-headline"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;INTEGRATE VIDEO IN YOUR ENGAGEMENTS:&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Videos as on-site engagements have been proven to enhance the user experience. Since videos immediately capture a user&amp;rsquo;s attention, integrating video in a seamless way can boost engagement instantly.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Shoppers are smart, savvy, and know what they&amp;rsquo;re after. It&amp;rsquo;s important to find new ways to engage them and provide a path to purchase that is unique to their journey. Personalizing the shopping experience will not only enhance your shoppers&amp;rsquo; experiences, but it will give them a reason to keep coming back to shop with you. &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;[FF]&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Jonathan Goodwin is a Partnership Executive at UpSellit, with 9 years of digital marketing experience.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;img alt="Jonathan Goodwin" src="__media/jonathan-goodwin.PNG" style="width: 795px; height: 162px;" /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
&lt;i&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

REGISTER NOW FOR #ASW20 &lt;/strong&gt; &lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.eiseverywhere.com/ereg/index.php?eventid=464203&amp;amp;reference=blog" target="_blank" title="https://www.eiseverywhere.com/ereg/index.php?eventid=464203&amp;amp;reference=blog"&gt;&lt;img alt="Register now " src="__media/451344_ASW20-Banners_600x120_062119-16.png" style="width: 600px; height: 120px;" /&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p style="text-align: center;"&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;' data-image="__media/libraries/blog/Cart-Abandonment.jpg" data-library-i-d="8284" data-library-name="Blog" data-library-type="template-library-blog" data-slug="blog/the-importance-of-personalizing-cart-abandonment-strategies" data-title="The importance of personalizing cart abandonment strategies" style="float: left; list-style: none; position: relative; width: 346.5px;">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__wrapper">
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image--cover" style="background-image: url('__media/libraries/blog/__thumbs/__500x500.Cart-Abandonment.jpg');">
<a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__image__link" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/the-importance-of-personalizing-cart-abandonment-strategies','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/the-importance-of-personalizing-cart-abandonment-strategies&quot;});"> <img alt="" src="__media/libraries/blog/__thumbs/__500x500.Cart-Abandonment.jpg"/> </a>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header">
<h2 class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title"> <a class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__title__link js-librarylink-entry" href="javascript:openRemoteModal('blog/the-importance-of-personalizing-cart-abandonment-strategies','ajax',{},false,'',{&quot;dimension15&quot;:&quot;blog/the-importance-of-personalizing-cart-abandonment-strategies&quot;});">The importance of personalizing cart abandonment strategies</a> </h2>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta">
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__date"> Sep 10, 2019 </span>
<span class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__header__meta__author"> Affiliate Summit </span>
</div>
</div>
<div class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item__body">
            One of the most important aspects of conversion enhancement is personalizing the shopping experience. Through personalization, you help streamline conversions for the advertiser. By Jonathan Goodwin 
          </div>

<li class="m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item m-libraries-blogs-list__items__item--id-27715 js-library-item" data-author="Geno Prussakov" data-content-i-d="27715" data-content-type="Entry" data-date="05-Sep-2019" data-description='&lt;p class="ck-intro-text"&gt;&lt;strong&gt;The inaugural #ASE19 affiliate marketing workshops by AM Days were a tremendous success. &lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;The rooms were packed, and each workshop was highly-rated by the respective. But you don&amp;rsquo;t have to take my word for it! &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Check out our recap video below&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt; to get a good feeling of how it all went.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;widget content="@chev@iframe width=@quot@560@quot@ height=@quot@315@quot@ src=@quot@https://www.youtube.com/embed/C5CfdI1Ce6Q@quot@ frameborder=@quot@0@quot@ allow=@quot@accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture@quot@ allowfullscreen&amp;gt;@chev@/iframe&amp;gt;" contenteditable="false" rendermethodselect="renderIt" widgetdisplayname="3rd Party Code" widgetname="Snippet" widgettype="Core"&gt;&lt;widgetinfobar contenteditable="false"&gt;&lt;i class="icon-code" contenteditable="false"&gt;&lt;/i&gt;3rd Party Code&lt;/widgetinfobar&gt;&lt;/widget&gt;&lt;br /&gt;
Building on our New York success, I&amp;rsquo;m excited to announce that we&amp;rsquo;re bringing &lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;AM Days to Las Vegas too!&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;There will be number of&lt;i&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;a href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/am-days-at-asw20" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank"&gt;AM Days workshops held within the framework Affiliate Summit West 2020&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/i&gt;. On my birthday, January 27, I will teach my&amp;nbsp;Advertiser&amp;rsquo;s Crash Course in Affiliate Marketing, while the legendary affiliate manager Wade Tonkin will equip you with everything you need to&amp;nbsp;Identify &amp;amp; Recruit Targeted Content Partners. Lawyer David Adler, on the other hand, will address&amp;nbsp;Strategic Approaches to Handling Legal Risk in Affiliate Marketing.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Any one of these 2.5-hr workshops will pay off your trip to Affiliate Summit West 2020. Spaces are limited, and passes are the cheapest if you buy them early.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;a class="ck-button-one" href="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/am-days-at-asw20?utm_source=BLOG&amp;amp;utm_medium=BLOG%205.9.19" target="_blank" title="https://www.affiliatesummit.com/west/am-days-at-asw20?utm_source=BLOG&amp;amp;utm_medium=BLOG%205.9.19"&gt;&amp;gt;&amp;gt; FIND OUT MORE AND REGISTER HERE&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;p&gt;&amp;nbsp;&lt;/p&gt;' data-image="__media/libraries/blog/geno.png" data-library-i-d="8284" data-library-name="Blog" data-library-type="template-library-blog" data-slug="blog/inaugural-am-days-workshops-at-ase19-took-new-york-by-storm" data-title="Inaugural AM Days Workshops at #ASE19 took New York by storm" style="float: left; list-style: none; position: relative; width: 346.5px;">

            The first ever AM Days workshops at Affiliate Summit was a huge success! Check out the highlights and how you can sign up to workshops at Affiliate Summit West 2020.
